name: Ada
descZh:
麥克嵩王宮內的洗衣女工之一，資歷非常淺，但已經闖了不少禍了。在總管姊姊的保護下，才免於被開除。
在一次搬運衣服時，被冒險者襲擊並變裝成他，自己則被擊暈，丟包在附近的小巷子內。
descEn:
A laundry lady in the Macksohn Palace who is inexperienced, but already made enough mistakes that nearly got her fired, if not for the kindness of her manager.
Ada was knocked out and replaced by the adventurers when she was carrying the laundry, dropped in the alley nearby.

name: Addie Applewood
descZh:
土城太陽議會蘋果席的代表，負責土城的外交。
有兩個孩子：Penny Applewood和Cash Applewood。
descEn:
The representative of the Seat of Apple in the Council of Sols in Mudtown, in charge of diplomacy.
Addie has two kids: Penny Applewood and Cash Applewood.

name: Adrian Paulson
descZh: Wescoe現任市長。比起鎮長，主要工作更接近於主持Wescoe的議會。看似高傲、冷酷，年約40歲的男子。
descEn: The current mayor of Wescoe, though closer to council speaker. A proud and cold man in his 40s.

name: Alex
descZh:
大學城科技區的工匠，專長是製作機甲。個性很直，但同時也討厭個性很直的人。
冒險者們帶著金屬手臂來找他研究，他十分有興趣。
比起和冒險者們討錢，他提出了請Midori把手臂拆下來借他研究，隔天再還給他，作為交易的籌碼。
descEn:
A mechanic in the tech division at the Great Citadel, who is best at working on mechas. She is a straight forward woman, but also dislike others who is straight forward.
The adventurers came to her with a metal arm, and she was interested in examining it.
Rather than charging the adventurers fee, Alex proposed that Midori take her arm down for her to do some research.

name: Alfenor
descZh:
被稱為蜘蛛王（The Spider King）。
是多數人認定蜘蛛神教的主神，但其實地位低於母親大人。
10836年，由妖精王國的Elmond醫生、Fallon主教，和Norvelle的屍體粉塵，透過儀式融合而成。
descEn:
Also known as the Spider King.
Alfenor is mostly known as the God of the Spider-God religion, but is actually below Mother.
At year 10836, Alfenor was created by forging Dr. Elmond, Bishop Fallon and the dust of Norvelle’s body in the Elvish Kingdom through a ritual.

name: Alfie Fuller
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮的酒鬼，似乎總是醉醺醺的遊蕩在街上。
年約50，看起來在鎮上沒有家人。
時常酒醉後闖入勞迪俱樂部嚇唬來訪的外地人。
住在Bruce家隔壁的破舊房屋內。
descEn:
The local drunk of Vowalon, who was always drunk on the road.
He was in his 50s and seems to be all alone in the town.
Alfie is often drunk while entering the Rowdy’s Club and scared travelers.
He lived in a house that is quite in a bad condition next the Bruce’s house.

name: Andrea Day
descZh:
大學城歷史區的現任區長。
個性古怪，有強烈的毒癮，辦公室基本上是煙霧瀰漫。
有個叫Melvin的助手。
對各種不同宗教都有研究，過去曾研究攔截靈魂的方法，因此捕捉到Roline被月神帶走的靈魂。
descEn:
The current leader of the History District in the Great Citadel.
Andrea is a weird tempered man who has a very strong addiction to drugs, with his office mostly covered with dust.
He had an assistant named Melvin.
Andrea did research on all different religions, and once succeeded to intercept a soul, who happened to be Roline that was taken away by Phynoir.

name: Andronikos Palailogos
descZh:
簡稱Andy，是一名珠寶商，也是Yamada Aoi的師傅。
在大學城科技區有個自己的空間。
除了收藏寶石外，也有自己種植茶葉，並有飲茶的習慣。
descEn:
Also known as Andy, the man is a jewel trader, and also the master of Yamada Aoi.
Andronikis has a place of his own in the Tech district in the Great Citadel.
Other than jewels, Andronikos also grow tea and is very used to drinking tea in the traditional way.

name: Anna
descZh:
Sebano鎮長Thorne的妻子，視覺年齡約二十初頭，是個妖精。在Thorne當上鎮長一段時間後來到Sebano，與Thorne相識並結婚。
在瑟巴諾被離奇屠村後，出現在Paladin面前，並透過自己的技術，將溶成泥的冒險者們重新培育出來。
似乎是蜘蛛王Alfenor的後裔以及信徒。
在鎮長家的地底有座自己的實驗室。
將冒險者們重新培育出來後，Anna便消失了，但冒險者們卻發現自己身上出現了蜘蛛網型的印記，似乎是個詛咒。
再次出現時，Anna與母親大人一同威脅Paladin，後來又偽裝成Roline試著將Paladin帶走，實際是想對Paladin逼婚，以藉由他的貴族身份拿點好處。
透過Paladin的身體，將母親大人奪舍後，成為新的蜘蛛神。
descEn:
Anna is an elf who is the wife of mayor Thorne of Sebano, and looks like in her early 20s. She came to Sebano short after Thorne became the mayor of the town, and got married in a short time.
After the macabre slaughter of Sebano, Anna showed up to Paladin, and reformed the other adventurers from mud.
Anna seems to be a descendant and believer of Alfenor.
She has her own lab at the basement of the mayor’s house.
After recreating the adventurers, Anna disappeared, but the adventurers found some spider web-shaped totem on their bodies, that seems like a curse.
When Anna reappeared, she and Mother threatened Paladin, and also disguised as Roline, trying to take Paladin away. She was intended to force Paladin into marriage to take advantage of his noble identity.
Anna later invaded Mother’s body through Paladin, and became the new Spider God.

name: Anya LaVinci
descZh:
由Sha’Doom偽裝的金髮人類貴族女子。
自稱為握手哥LaVinci先生的妹妹，主動接近Midori。
descEn:
A blond noble lady who is actually disguised by Sha’Doom.
She claimed to be the sister of Mr. LaVinci, and tried to approach Midori.

name: Augustin McFly
descZh: 禁忌巢穴的老闆，喜愛穿著奇裝異服，將自己打扮得像個魔法師一樣，但是自己並不會使用魔法。
descEn:
The owner of the Forbidden Lair.
Augustin loves dressing in weird clothes like a wizard, but doesn’t know magic at all.

name: Bamu Torrence
descZh:
巴姆的雜貨店的老闆。
年約40。
標準的生意人，能把東西賣出去的方法就是好方法。
descEn:
The owner of Bamu’s Groceries, a man in his 40s.
A typical business man, who believes that any way that can sell his merchandise is a good way.

name: Bartosz Richmond
descZh:
貝瑟頓的里奇蒙爵士。
里奇蒙家族似乎過去十分興旺，如今卻風華不再，且淪為城內人的笑話。
爵士於60歲左右時便開始失智，如今只能靠宅邸內的傭人用輪椅推著他才能行動。
他時不時會呼喊著「Agnes」這個名字，但從家譜無法確定他喊的是他的老婆，還是祖母，兩人都叫Agnes。
他有個女兒叫Riley。
爵士也對部分詞語有所反應，如「T.I.D.E.S.」。
descEn:
Syr Richmond from Batherdon.
The Richmond family used to be rich, but now they are nothing but a joke in Batherdon.
Bartosz suffered from dementia around his 60s, and can only move in a wheelchair with the aid of a maid in his mansion.
He often yells the name “Agnes", but can’t tell if it was his wife or grandmother, who both had the name Agnes.
He has a daughter named Riley.
Bartosz also responds to some words, like “T.I.D.E.S.".

name: Basuu
descZh:
在《The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman》中El'Nore新任的長老。有一名弟弟叫Dosuu。
中年半妖精男性。
與來訪的Gustavo有激烈的爭執。
對來訪的冒險者們不予理睬，但在冒險者們離開營帳後，似乎表現出對於有人在調查Gustavo的死因很警惕。
descEn:
The new leader of El'Nore in “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman". He has a brother named Dosuu.
A middle-aged half-elf.
He had an argument with Gustavo that went fierce.
Didn’t care about the visiting adventurers, but after they left the camp, he seemed to be very alert about people investigating the death of Gustavo.

name: Beau
descZh:
麥克嵩當地的七歲小女孩。父母在比武大會中死去，因此成為孤兒。
因為視台北市議員為偶像，要求加入一起冒險。在Midori與Siri的認可下加入台北市議員，並視Midori為媽媽，Siri為爸爸。
說話十分衝動不忌言，才剛加入台北市議員，得罪了當中不少人。
到妖精荒野後，以救世主的身份留在那裡，但最終除了Beau外，其他當地居民都在拉索斯教入侵後被消滅。回到物質世界時已年過40，便和冒險者們一起繼續以剿滅拉索斯教為目標冒險。
descEn:
A 7 years old girl fro, Macksohn, who lost her parents in the Macksohn Tournament, thus became an orphan.
Beau sees the Councilor of Tapei as her idol, so she asked to join them. With Midori and Siri acknowledging her, she joined the party and sees them as her parents.
Beau often speaks recklessly, and have already offended quite a lot of the party members.
When the party traveled to the Feywild, Beau stayed as the Messiah, but later she only survived to be the only one left after the Laxthos invasion. She was in her 40s when she came back to the material world, with the adventurers not aged yet. She traveled with the party and aimed to defeat the Laxthos.

name: Beatrice Eden
descZh:
被YHWH與Ron目擊，與Cena一同出現在王宮前市集的女子。
年約二十的年輕人類女子，是麥克嵩貴族Eden家的繼承人。
descEn:
A woman accompanied by Cena in the Macksohn Plaza who was seen by YHWH and Ron.
She was a human in her 20s, the heir to the Macksohn noble family House Eden.

name: King Benevol II
descZh:
麥丁頓的前任統治者。
在麥克嵩比武大會時遭到Frankie吸乾精力，卻在Frankie消失後彷彿完全恢復元氣，悄悄逃離了包廂。
在那之後，據說他傳位給了他的兒子艾略特四世，不見了。
descEn:
The ex-ruler of the Mattington Kingdom.
His soul was sucked out but Frankie at the Macksohn Tournament, but recovered after Frankie was gone, leaving the private box sneakily.
After that, it was known that he passed the throne to his son, Elliot IV, and was not seen again.

name: Benny Cozlothramuda
descZh:
本名Benjamin班傑明，出身於歷史悠久的矮人家族。
Vowalon長年的腕力冠軍。
於Vowalon擔任Jasmine失蹤事件的搜救隊一員，雖然對於沒能找到Jasmine感到很懊惱，但本身爽朗的個性讓他對此沒有過度責怪自己。
descEn:
Benjamin was his full name, and he was from an ancient dwarf family.
Benny had been the longtime arm-wrestling champion in Vowalon.
He was also one of the rescue team to find Jasmine, but was upset that he failed. Good for him that he was a bright man that it didn’t linger too long.

name: Bernard Norm
descZh:
麥克嵩的年輕貴族，家族似是經營牲畜的。
似乎對貴族間的雜交派對頗為熟悉。
與華生和Sugalu在王宮花園相談甚歡，而且對Sugalu十分在意。
似乎在鬥爭中被他所信任的Pamela害死。
descEn:
A young noble in Macksohn, whose family does livestock business.
Bernard is quite familiar with the secret orgy parties within the noble circle.
He met Watson and Sugalu at the Palace Garden, and seemed to care about Sugalu pretty much.
It was suspected that his death was directed by his noble friend Pamela, who seemed to betray him due to the conflict between the nobles on whether to support the new king or not.

name: BoBo-C/BoBo-Z
descZh:
與冒險者前往完成和洛森王國交易的機器人。
擔任馬車駕駛。
在呼喚了前輩BoBo-W後，與Dragon’s Orb結合，進化成BoBo-Z。
descEn:
A robot that traveled with the adventurers to the Lothum Kingdom, who acted as the carriage driver.
After calling BoBo-W, BoBo-C merged with the Dragon’s Orb and evolved into BoBo-Z.

name: BoBo-V/BoBo-W
descZh:
Zach的機器人夥伴，跟隨冒險者前往礦脈，取得Dragon’s Orb。
自行取得Dragon’s Orb後將它融入身體，進化成BoBo-W。
二十多年後，以BoBo-W的身份，協助BoBo-C進化成BoBo-Z，完成克里歐門王國與洛森王國的交易。
descEn:
The robot companion of Zach, following the adventurers to the mine to retrieve the Dragon’s Orb.
After retrieving the Dragon’s Orb, BoBo-V merged with it and evolved into BoBo-W.
20 years later, BoBo-W helped BoBo-C evolve into BoBo-Z, finalizing the trade between the Chryomen Kingdom and the Lothum Kingdom.

name: Bol-Bol/BoBo-OMEGA
descZh:
擬人形機器人，帶領冒險者們與BoBo-C前往完成與洛森王國的交易，但在半途中被冒險者要求拆解成零件。零件中顯示他的型號為BoBo-OMEGA。
被設定為幼時因名字Bol-Bol與機器人型號BoBo相似，而不喜歡自己的名字。
背後有Uma女王以外的勢力，但是沒有成功被冒險者們套出身份。
清楚知道自己是機器人的身份。
descEn:
A humanoid robot that accompanied the adventurers and BoBo-C to finalize the trade between the Lothum Kingdom and the Chryomen Kingdom, but was disassembled by itself due to the adventurers’ command. It was labeled BoBo-OMEGA.
It had a setting that due to its name close to the robot series BoBo, it disliked its name when it was young.
There seemed to be someone behind it other that Queen Uma of the Chryomen Kingdom, but it remained anonymous.
Bol-Bol is fully aware that it is actually a robot.

name: Brock
descZh:
Macksohn當地人，年約30的半獸人，舉止溫文有禮，有他自己的幽默感。對Macksohn與崔尼斯教有些不信任。
在Mr. Moon的推薦下，加入冒險者們組成的樂團Rhythm of the Wild，擔任打擊手。
從小在Macksohn長大，父母經營武器打鐵鋪，卻因經營不善而倒閉。
曾在Nightfall酒館演出。
被斗篷男子攻擊後陷入昏迷，且逐漸變得黝黑，長出毛皮，越來越不像人型生物了，最後成了拉茲特獸。
descEn:
A local Macksohn half-orc who is polite and humor in his own way. He didn’t trust Macksohn and the Trinix religion.
After the introduction by Mr. Moon, Brock joined the adventurer-formed band, Rhythm of the Wild as the drummer.
Brock grew up in Macksohn, with his parents as smiths, but the shop was closed due to bad business.
Brock used to play music in the tavern Nightfall.
He was down after attacked by the hooded figure and started to grew dark fur out of his skin, less human-like than before. He ended up becoming a Laztek.

name: Bruce Dunham
descZh: 勞迪俱樂部的老闆，年約50。
descEn: The owner of Rowdy’s Club. About 50 years old.

name: Bruce Tallis
descZh:
T.I.D.E.S.的成員之一，身形孔武有力，因此和阿龍在組織集會時，建立了交情。
但因一連串的誤會，導致自己陷入萬劫不復的深淵……
descEn:
A member of T.I.D.E.S. who has a strong body build, thus became friends with Al-lon during the T.I.D.E.S. gathering.
However, due to several misunderstandings, Bruce is now descending into the abyss with no return……

name: Cash Applewood
descZh:
本名Cassius。
Penny的弟弟，長相清秀。
想藉由贏得本屆的「春日精靈」，來讓姊姊Penny卸下重擔，同時不失去家庭因「春日精靈」得到的好處。
十分崇拜阿龍。
descEn:
Cassius Applewood.
Penny’s younger brother. Has a delicate and pretty face.
Cash wants to win the title of “the Spirit of Spring" to unleash the burden of his sister, while keeping the benefits of the title for the family.
Cash looks up to Al-lon pretty much.

name: Cena
descZh:
Magnus爵士聘請的馬伕，本名John，被Paladin稱為Cena。
在駕馬車前往麥克嵩前，才剛被Magnus爵士聘用一個月不到，薪水都還沒領。
協助Paladin將拷問他的衛兵擊暈，假扮成衛兵押解Paladin走在麥克嵩城內。
與Paladin一同在Sunrise鬥毆，帶著Paladin的魅力頭帶與大部分的武器消失在麥克嵩。
在比武大會說明會前，與一名女子，Beatrice，出現在王宮前市集。
descEn:
A stableman hired by Syr Magnus. His name was John, but was mocked by Paladin as Cena.
Before driving the carriage to Macksohn, he had only been hired less than a month, without getting his payment yet.
Cena helped knocked out the guard that tortured Paladin, and disguised as the guard to take Paladin into Macksohn.
Cena joined Paladin in the tavern fight in Sunrise, but disappeared with Paladin’s Headband of Charm and most weapons after the fight.
Before the Macksohn Tournament, he was seen with a noble lady, Beatruce, at the Macksohn Plaza.

name: Dr. Chandra Pyresong
descZh:
YHWH過去的師傅，是一名烈焰術士。一頭短髮，繡有火焰的黑色皮衣是他的專屬標誌。
在冒險者們來到大學城時，正好在外修行。
在大學城有個十分舒服的住處，讓冒險者們可以暫時居住。
在趕回大學城後，追逐有著巫妖之手的Ron，在兩人單獨戰鬥時自爆而亡，但Ron僅重傷而已。
descEn:
The former master of YHWH, a pyromancer. She had short hair and shapes of flames on her black leather jacket.
She was out of town traveling when the adventurers arrived the Great Citadel.
She had a nice place to live in the Great Citadel, that acted as a temporary home for the adventurers.
After she hurried back to the Great Citadel, Dr. Chandra chased down Ron, who had the lich’s hand, but self-exploded during the fight, while Ron only had some scratches.

name: Chi-Chi
descZh:
住在Sinking Echoes沼澤深處小木屋內的一名老太太，自稱從出生至此都住在這。
行動非常緩慢，外貌有些醜惡，但對冒險者們非常溫暖。
屋子內有異常多的巴坦腳，且似乎獵殺了不少青蛙人。
descEn:
An old lady living in a cabin in the swamp, the Sinking Echoes, who claimed to have been living here since she was born.
Chi-Chi moved very slowly, and didn’t have a good looking, but was very warm to the adventurers.
There are quite a lot of Bach’tahn appendages in her cabin, and it also seemed like Chi-Chi hunted down quite a lot of Bullywugs.

name: Child Prodigy
descZh:
小神童，本名小神童。
T.I.D.E.S.組織的年輕小女孩，大約8-10歲。
性格高傲，無所不知。
descEn:
Child Prodigy (yup, that’s her legit real name).
A young girl in T.I.D.E.S., age 8-10.
Quite a proud one, who knows alot.

name: Clark
descZh:
Macksohn旅店White Brick的櫃台之一。
是新人Kess的前輩。
descEn:
The front desk of the Macksohn hotel White Brick.
Works with the rookie Kess

name: Clementine Allison
descZh: 夜夢者的老闆。
descEn: The owner of the Night Dreamers.

name: Connie Cornell
descZh:
土城太陽議會的議員之一，玉米席的Connie Cornell，被阿龍稱為玉米小姐。
負責掌管土城的娛樂相關事項，包含春天精靈的投票。
疑似與山賊團體「海雅特山交響樂」有所勾結，但以他所述，春天精靈語山賊之間的契約早在他擔任議員之前就已經存在了。
descEn:
A member of the Council of Sols in Mudtown, Connie Cornell, the Seat of Corn, was called “Miss Corn" by Al-lon.
Connie is in charge of entertainment in Mudtown, including the voting of the Spirit of Spring.
It seemed that Connie might have worked out something suspicious with the bandit group “Mt. Hyatt Symphony", but as she said, the contract between the bandits and the Spirit of Spring had been there before she was in the council.

name: Dr. Crow
descZh:
在《The False Hydra of Moorland Haunt》中Moorland Haunt當地醫生，似乎是個德魯伊。
養了一隻狗狗，叫Marco。
15051年在冒險者們來訪時，已經沒了狗狗，甚至不記得自己是否有養過狗。
Dr. Crow在診所的牆壁上凌亂的以德魯伊語寫下自己記得關於兩年前被怪獸襲擊的隻字片語，但卻無法將內容完整拼湊。
descEn:
The doctor in Moorland Haunt from “The False Hydra of Moorland Haunt". Seems like a druid.
He has a dog companion named Marco.
When the adventurers visited Dr. Crow in 15051D.E., the dog was gone, and Dr. Crow didn’t even knew if he had a dog or not.
Dr. Crow marked some druidic writings on his walls, try to record the monster attack incident that happened 2 years ago, but couldn’t piece them together.

name: Dan
descZh:
冒險者於多侖維爾遇見的一名中年樂手，當時正用魯特琴彈奏著《Memories》。
自稱過去出生於麥克嵩，但已離開好一陣子，到處活動。
十分不會看場合，好幾次在錯誤的時機做錯誤的事，讓冒險者們對他感到十分困擾。
descEn:
A middle-aged artist the adventurers ran into in Dorrenville, when he was playing the song “Memories".
Claimed to be born in Macksohn, but had left for a while visiting other places.
Dan isn’t good at reading the air, doing wrong things at wrong time, making the adventurers quite upset with him.

name: Daryl Warren
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮的鎮長。
Jasmine（潔思敏）之夫，Samick（山米克）之父。
在Samick死後便變得鬱鬱寡歡。
descEn:
The mayor of Vowalon.
Husband to Jasmine and father to Samick.
Became depressed after the death of Samick.

name: Dr. David
descZh:
Macksohn當地醫生。
在Sunrise目睹殺人事件後被Lemmy威脅。
在Midori博得他的信任後，從他身上得到不少關於這座城市的情報，也引薦Ron去Edmond’s Diner（Macksohn分店）擔任廚師。
為人十分理性與冷靜。
與Sunrise前老闆Jonathan、衛兵Scar-Face以及Edmond’s Diner的店長Lewis都是舊識。
非常照顧他的弟弟，Dennis。
descEn:
A local doctor in Macksohn.
Threatened by Lemmy after he saw the murder in Sunrise.
After gaining his trust, Midori got a lot of information about Macksohn from him, and also recommend Ron to Edmond’s Diner as a cook
Is a radical and calm man.
He had known the ex-owner of Sunrise, Jonathan, the guard, Scar-Face, and the manager of Edmond’s Diner, Lewis for a long time.
Dr. David takes very good care of his brother, Dennis.

name: Dennis
descZh:
自稱Dennis the Demigod，是麥克嵩David醫生的雙胞胎弟弟，與David醫生長得可以說是一模一樣，不過打扮較為陰沈。
似乎對於蜘蛛王Alfenor在冒險者們身上下的詛咒有些看法。
其實Dennis是個不學無術的失業者，只是想證明給自己的哥哥自己也是有能力的，但卻沒有辦法拯救被詛咒的冒險者們。不過，Dennis的確曾去過深淵，但那是在他年幼時生病陷入昏迷時發生的事。
descEn:
Called himself “Dennis the Demigod". Dennis is the twin brother of Dr. David, they look quite alike, but he is more gloomy than his brother.
Seemed to have some thoughts about the curse that Alfenor put on the adventurers.
Dennis is actually a jobless man, trying to prove to his brother that he is capable of doing meaningful things, but failed to save the cursed adventurers. However, Dennis did went to the Deep, but that happened when he got into coma after he got sick when he was a child.

name: Domneil
descZh:
自稱是詐欺之神奧提森的兒子。
透過項鍊與Tai Tai我還要以及Midori對話，並簽下契約。
曾將Jiaheng、Uko與Usioni從死亡救起，而與他們訂下契約，要他們比賽惡作劇，讓勝者成為他在人世間的代理人。
descEn:
Claimed to be the son of Ultisen, the God of Trickster.
Talked to Tai Tai and Midori through a necklace, and made them signed a contract.
He onced save Jiaheng, Uko and Usioni from death, and forced them to sign a contract to race out who is the best trickster. The winner would be his champion in the material world.

name: Don
descZh:
在宗祠入口迎接冒險者們，帶領他們進入Fenadra的嚮導。對著Ubbo說「歡迎回家」。
再三警告他們必須有單音節的化名，否則在Fenadra會引起不必要的困擾。
descEn:
Don awaits the adventurers in the temple to lead them into Fenadra. He said “welcome home" to Ubbo.
Don warned the adventurers to have aliases with one syllable only, to avoid any unwanted problem.

name: Dosuu
descZh:
在《The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman》中El'Nore當地半妖精男子，長老Basuu的弟弟。
因為懂普通語，被人請來帶領冒險者們見El'Nore的長老與教主。
descEn:
A half elf in El'Nore from “The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman". Also the brother of the leader, Basuu.
Knew Common, thus was asked to lead the adventurers to meet the leader and priest in El'Nore.

name: Eddie
descZh:
Wescoe庇護地的夜班櫃檯人員。
與Garlia為搭檔，年紀比Garlia稍微長一點，工作上也是Garlia的前輩。
個性似乎有點輕佻，有時候會讓顧客不太高興。
descEn:
A night shift front desk at the Haven in Wescoe.
Work as the partner of Garlia, who is a younger than him.
Seems to be a bit frivolous towards customers, which led to some customers being unhappy.

name: Edmond
descZh:
Edmond’s Diner的老闆兼大廚，不過現在不太親自下廚了。
戴著特殊設計的廚師帽，似乎很刻意地把自己的耳朵塞在帽子底下。
descEn:
The owner and chef of Edmond’s Diner, but he rarely goes into the kitchen now.
Edmond wears a specially-designed chef’s hat, trying to hide his ears to hide his identity as an elf.

name: Eevie
descZh:
年近六十的婦人，似乎常常在麥克嵩圖書館出現。
與Paladin相談甚歡，也表示自己和紫羅蘭是好朋友。
對於政局有不少自己的看法，消息似乎也相當靈通。
似乎能自由進出圖書館的辦公室。
descEn:
An old lady in her 60s who often show herself in the Macksohn Library.
She had a nice talk to Paladin, also claiming to be a good friend with the Violet of Macksohn.
Eevie has a lot of opinions about the kingdom, and seems to have quite a lot of sources.
It looks like she can freely go into the office in the library.

name: Elby / Dr. White
descZh:
出現在Dorrenville的「醫生」。
外觀年齡約二十初頭，皮膚蒼白，髮色銀白，穿著也是全白，只有雙眼是碧藍色的。身形非常纖瘦到看起來不健康的程度，給人一種妖精的感覺，卻沒有尖耳朵。
可以在一般時空和妖精荒野間穿越。
他的群體似乎有著一般時空沒有的醫療技術。
在一般世界被稱為Dr. White，而在妖精荒野則被稱為Elby。
在主持Midori和Beau的救世主試煉的最後，被發現是拉索斯在妖精荒野的間諜，善於使用魔法，且手上刺滿拉索斯教的經文。在將Midori拖往另一個時空時，被Midori殺死。
descEn:
A “doctor" appearing in Dorrenville.
Looked like in her early 20s, with pale skin, silver-white hair, and also wears in all white, with only her eyes blue. She was so thin that it looked unhealthy. She gave a feeling of elf, but without the pointy ears.
Elby can transport between the material world and the Feywild freely.
Her people seemed the have a high-tech medical profession not seen in the material world.
She was called Dr. White in the material world, but Elby in the Feywild.
After hosting the trial of the Messiah between Midori and Beau, she was found to be the spy working for Laxthos in Feywild. She was good in magic, and had Laxthos writings all on her arms. She was killed by Midori after dragging Midori in another plane.

name: King Elliot IV
descZh:
麥丁頓王國的新任國王。
年約10歲，母后為Marian女士。
被認為只是個魁儡而已。
descEn:
The new King of the Mattington Kingdom.
He is about 10 years old, and his mother is Lady Marian.
He is seemed as a puppet only.

name: Elly Riversend
descZh: 阿龍的養母，十分溫柔慈祥。
descEn:
Al-lon’s foster mother.
Elly is a warm and gentle lady.

name: Elmond
descZh:
妖精王國的醫生，擁有由蜘蛛絲製作而成的紗布。
透過儀式，與Fallon和Norvelle的粉塵融合為Alfenor。
descEn:
A doctor in the Elf Kingdom Lothum.
He has bandages made by spider-web.
With a ritual, he merged with Fallon and the dust of Norvelle, becoming Alfenor.

name: Emerald Gorsen
descZh: 與父親共同經營冠軍工廠，主要接待客人與接訂單。
descEn: Emerald runs the Champion Factory with his father, mainly in charge of the guest and orders.

name: Emma
descZh:
Vowalon的年輕少女，年約18，一頭黑髮。與年齡相近的Fiona是從小的好朋友。
於Rowdy’s Club向Paladin求婚未果，決定在Vowalon癡心地等待Paladin冒險後回來找他。
descEn:
A young girl from Vowalon around 18, who had brunette hair. She was a good friend with Fiona, who is close to her age.
Proposed to Paladin but failed in the Rowdy’s Club, decided to wait for him when he got back from his adventure.

name: Enelmor Arylith
descZh:
阿龍的嬸嬸。
與Theramond為夫妻，有三名孩子：Serathe、Nylessa和Vaelric。
有嚴重的失眠，因此自己磨製安眠藥，存放在廚房內。
descEn:
Al-lon’s aunt.
Wife of Theramond, father of three: Serathe, Nylessa, and Vaelric.
She suffers from severe insomnia, so she made sleeping powders herself, and kept it in the kitchen.

name: Essis
descZh:
狂暴戰士幫成員之一，鬥名為「巫妖剋星」。
前往聖Rayami島調查後下落不明。
冒險者在金海岸礦坑下方的廢墟中找到了她的下落並一同打到了礦坑中的怪物。
戰鬥結束後Essis將她的武器「異教徒殺手」送給了冒險者。
descEn:
A member of the Raging Warriors, known in battle as the “Lichbane.
She went missing after traveling to St. Rayami Island for an investigation.
The adventurers eventually discovered her fate in the ruins beneath the Golden Coast Mines and fought alongside her against the monsters lurking there.
After the battle, Essis entrusted her weapon, “Heretic Slayer,” to the adventurers.

name: Eva
descZh:
卓茲蘭酒館Silence老闆Jacob的新婚妻子，年紀十分的輕。
看起來十分靦腆害羞，穿著也很樸素。
descEn:
The newly wed young wife of Jacob of the tavern Silence in Drogsland.
Eva looked shy and dressed very simple.

name: Evil Be-4
descZh:
土城的「壞蛋四人幫」，但阿龍總是稱他們為「壞四人」。成員包含：
喜愛勒索的Grindle，骯髒惡臭的Pibble，脾氣暴躁的Tumble，以及破壞公務的Zaffie。
時常霸凌土城的孩子們。
descEn:
The “Evil Gang of 4″ in Mudtown, but Al-lon always name them “Evil Be-4″. With members including:
The blackmailing Grindle, the dirty Pibble, the irritable Tumble, and the vadalist Zaffie.
They often pick on and bully kids in Mudtown.

name: Fallon
descZh:
妖精王國中樹林之神Nessis的主教，後來成為蜘蛛神教的創始者之一。
與Elmond醫生共同執行儀式，兩人與Norvelle的粉塵融合為Alfenor。
descEn:
The bishop of Nessis, the God of Forest, in the Elf Kingdom Lothum, who became one of the founder of the Spider-God religion.
Held the ritual with Dr. Elmond, merging with him and the dust of Norvelle to become Alfenor.

name: The Feywild Archmage
descZh:
妖精荒野大帳篷內的大法師，總是戴著斗篷，年紀似乎很大了。
大約每一百年會做出一個對妖精荒野重要的預言，至今為止都實現了。
平常以幫大帳篷內的成員們做日常的占卜維生。
靠著雙手在身前搓弄一顆假想的占卜球來凝聚與「神」溝通的力量，至少他如此認為。
descEn:
The archmage in the Great Tent in Feywild. She always wear a cloak, and seemed to be very old.
She made a prophecy that is important to the Feywild once per a hundred year, with all of them came true.
She does daily scrying for the inhabitant in the Great Tent for a living.
She played with an imagined crystal ball to communicate to “God", as she believed in.

name: Fiona
descZh:
Vowalon的年輕少女，年約16，一頭金髮。與年齡相近的Emma是從小的好朋友。
於Rowdy’s Club向Paladin求婚未果，傷心地往Vowalon的深夜奔去。
descEn:
A young blonde girl in Vowalon, around 16. She had been a good friend with Emma, who was close to her age.
Fiona proposed to Paladin at the Rowdy’s Club but failed, running into the night.

name: Mr. Flaerry
descZh:
Paladin的老師，前邁丁頓王國騎士團團長，現已退休。
待客十分大方，不過似乎和太太Rosa之間有些相處上的狀況，分房睡。
對於Korringfield一代的性產業似乎暸若指掌。
膝下無子，視Paladin為己出。
為了讓麥克嵩的紫羅蘭承認Paladin是她的兒子，放棄了自己的爵位。
descEn:
The mentor of Paladin, ex-head of the knight in the Mattington Kingdom, now retired.
Was a generous host, but seems to have some gap with his wife, as they slept separately.
Knew a lot about the sex industry in Korringfield.
Flaerry didn’t have any child, thus saw Paladin as his son.
He gave up his title to ask for the Violet of Macksohn to admit Paladin as her child.

name: The Fortune Teller
descZh:
寇林菲爾德的占卜師老太太。
在當地酒館「喝醉角落」和Paladin談交易，讓Paladin用自己的左耳拯救命危的父親。
耳朵掛有月亮造型的耳墜，暗示著他似乎是月神教的信仰者。
descEn:
An old fortune teller lady in Korringfield.
Had a deal with Paladin in the local tavern “Drunken Corner", with Paladin trading his left ear to save his dying father.
She had a moon-shaped earring, implying that she is a worshiper of the God of Moon, Phyneal.

name: Frankie
descZh:
Macksohn當地酒館Sunrise的店小二。
在Rhythm of the Wild組成時，搶先擔任樂團的贊助人，被Samael敬稱為老闆。
在Sunrise老闆Jonathan失蹤時，與Ron一同前往老闆家，但沒有找到人。Frankie前後言詞不一的行為讓Ron感到非常可疑。之後暫時擔任Sunrise的老闆，但與老闆失蹤似乎有什麼關聯……
在台北市議員重返Sunrise時，因為態度惡劣且敲詐他們，Frankie被切斷右手臂，且放入bag of holding內，慘遭滅口。在他被放入袋子前的最後一刻，口中吐出了「Sebano」的地名。
台北市議員們將Frankie棄屍於地下道內一處開口的底下。
在麥克嵩比武大會授獎儀式後，悄悄出現在國王巴納沃二世身後。在吸乾了國王的精力後，化身為惡魔，飛向台北市議員們所處的觀眾席，對他們出擊。在被台北市議員們擊敗時，留下了「I’ll be back.」一句話，便消失不見。
descEn:
A waiter in Sunrise, the local tavern in Macksohn.
When the adventurers formed the band “Rhythm of the Wild", he became the patron of the band, with Samael calling him boss.
When Jonathan, the owner of Sunrise gone missing, Ron and him went to Jonathan’s house, but couldn’t find anyone. His contradictory words got Ron suspicious. He later became the temporary owner of Sunrise, but it seemed like the missing of Jonathan had something to do with him……
As the party got back to Sunrise, he became mean and even extorted them, leading to his arm chopped off and himself dropped into the bag of holding. Before his last breath, he whispered the name of a nearby village “Sebano".
The party dropped his body under the sewer.
After the awarding ceremony at the Macksohn Tournament, Frankie sneaked up behind King Benevol II, and transformed into a demon after sucking out his spirit, flying to the auditorium, and attacked the party and the people. As the party defeated him, he left the words “I’ll be back" and disappeared.

name: Franz
descZh:
荒野旋律在Berners家晚宴認識的吟遊詩人，年輕人類男性。
他表示自己也曾和冒險者們到處遊歷，搜集了不少故事，對於《沃瓦倫之歌》有著很濃厚的興趣，邀請荒野旋律和他談談這首歌的故事。
在麥克嵩期間，居住於Brandon’s Corner。
過去的冒險團為Shadow Trackers，因成員之一Nebalon the Justice被暗影之父殺死而解散。除了Franz之外的團員都決定引退。Franz因此投身於研究暗影之父，而來到麥克嵩。對於拉索斯教也有一定程度的認識，而且懂拉索斯語。
在比武大會遭暗影之父襲擊後，似乎受到了刺激，創作了相關的樂曲，並加入台北市議員，追查暗影之父與拉索斯教的線索。
在從妖精荒野回來後，因為發現自己和台北市議員的方向不同，而決定自行離開了。
descEn:
A young bard that the Rhythm of the Wild got to know at the Berners Family banquet.
He told the party that he once was an adventurer, collected quite a lot of stories, and was very interested in “the Song of Vowalon", inviting the adventurers to tell him about the story behind it.
Lived in Brandon’s Corner while he was in Macksohn.
His past party was named Shadow Trackers, and the party broke up after one of the member, Nebalon the Justice, was killed by the Father of Shadows. Everyone but Franz chose to retire, while Franz came to Macksohn to study on the Father of Shadows. He knew quite a lot about Laxthos and can speak Laxthosian.
After being attacked by the Father of Shadows at the Macksohn Tournament, Franz was somewhat inspired and chose to travel with the Councilor of Taipei to gather more information about the Father of Shadows and Laxthos.
After coming back from the Feywild, Franz realized that his goal is different from the party, so he the party left quietly.

name: Freddy
descZh:
夏庭森的石頭店、雕塑店的老闆，有一手很精巧的手藝，能雕出非常精細且逼真的雕像。
除了自己的雕塑外，Freddy主要在店內販賣各種礦石和寶石。
他的店是夏庭森少數入夜後還營業的店舖，但曾經到訪過夏庭森多次的Ronald表示這是他第一次看見這間店營業。
descEn:
The owner of the sculptor shop and rock shop at Shartingson.
Freddy was a very talented sculptor who can make very realistic work.
Aside from his sculptures, Freddy also sold a kinds of rocks, minerals and diamonds.
His shops were the minority that is still open after sunset, but Ronald, who had visited Shartingson for quite some time, claimed that this is the first time he saw this shop opened.

name: Frederick Norman
descZh:
T.I.D.E.S.組織的現任領導者。
在《The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman》中，出錢聘請冒險者們尋找其失蹤兒子Gustavo的貴族。
人稱Syr Norman。
雖然愛護他的兒子Gustavo，但不想太過介入其生活。
有非常多眼線，以及不小的影響力。
在冒險者們逃離El'Nore後，讓他們在Norman宅邸待了好一段日子。
descEn:
The current leader of T.I.D.E.S.
The nobleman who paid the adventurers to find his lost son in “The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman".
He was often called Syr Norman.
Although he loved hos son Gustavo, he tried hard not to intervene Gustavo’s life.
Frederick had many informant working under him, and also he was quite powerful in the Kingdom, even in the Empire.
After the adventurers escaped El'Nore, he let them lived in the Norman mansion for quite a while.

name: Garlia
descZh:
Wescoe旅店庇護地的夜班櫃檯人員之一。
對客人十分客氣。
與Eddie為值班的搭檔。
descEn:
The night shift front desk at the Haven in Wescoe.
Garlia is always nice to the customers.
She works with Eddie as the same shift.

name: Gary
descZh:
Ra’Leer的狼夥伴，有比一般狼較高的智慧與力量。
異色瞳，左眼藍色，右眼橘色。
與Ra’Leer形影不離，甚至願意為了保護Ra’Leer而死。
descEn:
The companion of Ra’Leer, also a wolf with higher intelligence and stronger than most wolves.
Had heterochromatic pupils, with its left pupil blue and right orange.
Gary is always with Ra’Leer, and would even die protecting her.

name: Gary Berners
descZh:
Macksohn當地貴族家庭The Berners Family的成員之一。Jefferey的兒子，Selene的丈夫，Lance的父親。
現任麥丁頓王國禁衛軍的將軍，也是Syr Flaerry的繼位者。
在Berners家晚宴時隨時護衛著紫羅蘭。
對於蛋糕類的甜點似乎有著難以抗拒的心理。
descEn:
A family member of the Macksohn noble house, the Berners Family. The son of Jeffery, husband to Selene, and father of Lance.
Gary is currently the king’s guard of the Mattington Kingdom, and also the successor of Syr Flaerry.
Took care of Xandria, the Violet of Macksohn pretty closely at the Berners banquet.
Seems to be irresistible to sweets like cakes.

name: General Maliya Kaeyal
descZh:
萊斯諾的將軍，中年紅龍人女性。
個性強硬且難以溝通，連市長與大臣都對他敬畏三分。
強烈主張要「收復」對面的蜥蜴人城鎮克萊芬。
descEn:
The general in Leisnor, a mid-aged red dragonborn female.
Maliya is very fierce, even the mayor and the minister are afraid of her.
She has a very strong opinion on 'recovering' the lizardfolk town Clyphen.

name: Glen
descZh:
Macksohn衛兵，據說是紅髮有雀斑的年輕人類男子。
Scar-Face承諾Ron將派遣Glen至Sunrise配合調查Jonathan失蹤的事件。
descEn:
A young guard in Macksohn, seems like he was red-headed and had freckles.
Scar-Face committed to Ron the he would send Glen to help him investigate in the missing incident of Jonathan.

name: Graham Dawkin
descZh:
道金店舖的打鐵匠。
擁有高超的打鐵技術。
descEn:
The weapon smith of Dawkin’s Shop.
Graham had very excellent skills in smithing.

name: Gregory the Axe
descZh:
來參加麥克嵩比武大會的一名壯碩半獸人男子，過去幾年一樣有來參加。
有一把稱為「Magnet」，重量非常重的大斧頭。
答應Ron有關於比武大會的事可以向他詢問。
平常來到麥克嵩都居住在Brandon’s Corner。
descEn:
A strong half-orc man coming to Macksohn for the tournament every year.
Has a very heavy axe that he named “Magnet".
He assured Ron that he can ask him anything he wanted to know about the tournament.
Often live in Brandon’s Corner when traveling to Macksohn.

name: Grenland Folsen
descZh:
隱居於魏斯科鎮的強大魔法師。
寂靜神拉索斯的追隨者。
在台北市議員們的陪同下，穿越嚎叫森林，前往沃瓦倫鎮。
協助寇頓神父主持解除詛咒的祈禱儀式，卻也造成了沃瓦倫滅鎮事件，而後被台北市議員殺死。
descEn:
A powerful mage living in Wescoe.
A follower of Laxthos.
Traveled through the Howling Forest and arrived at Vowalon with the accompany of the Councilor of Taipei.
Helped Father Kaulton for the ritual to remove the curse, but ended up leading the town to be destroyed, but was killed by the Councilor of Taipei at the end.

name: Gustavo Norman
descZh:
在《The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman》中失蹤的年輕男子，是貴族Syr Norman的兒子。
經冒險者調查後，發現他在妖精部落El'Nore中意外殺死當地長老，被當地居民打死。
descEn:
The missing young man from “The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman", who is the son of Syr Norman.
After the investigation by the adventurers, Gustavo was found killed in the elvish tribe El'Nore by the locals.

name: Guu-Guu
descZh:
駐守於地下城一處入口的巨大食人魔，戴著一個黑色的面具，手持一根巨大棍棒。似乎看不見。
喜歡用疊字說話，最愛的東西是糖糖。
心理單純，像個孩子一樣。
descEn:
A huge orc who guarded the entrance of a dungeon with a black mask on his face and holding a giant stick in his hand. He seemed to be blind.
Guu-Guu loves baby talking, and candies are his favorite.
Guu-Guu had a pure heart like a child.

name: Dr. Halloway
descZh:
Paladin父親Magnus爵士的主治醫師。
待在Magnus爵士的臥房，細心照料他傷後的身體，看起來十分細心可靠。
descEn:
The attending doctor of Syr Magnus, the father of Paladin.
Stayed at Syr Magnus’ room and took care of him after he got hurt.
Looked like a careful and reliable person.

name: Harrel Mizel
descZh:
拉撒拿魔法商店的老闆，眼神看起來十分有智慧。
Old Nixul的好友與酒友。
與Arylith家的Nylessa似乎有不錯的交情。
descEn:
The owner of a magic item shop in Rathanad, who looks wise in his eyes.
A good friend and drinking buddy of Old Nixul.
Seems to be quite good with Nylessa Arylith.

name: Hayes
descZh:
受僱於瑪琳船長的船員。
與Nelson為夫妻。
慘死於荒島上。
descEn:
A sailor hired by Captain Marin.
Hayes is the wife of Nelson.
She was killed brutally on the island.

name: Hobb
descZh:
Sebano當地的黑幫老大之一，身材十分壯碩，但是手下似乎都不太擅長打架。
鎮上的一間「酒館」Hobb’s Party House似乎是他的黑幫的集散地。
似乎是拉索斯教的信奉者，手下的身上有刺拉索斯語的祝禱文。
與Drayer似乎過去就認識了。
和冒險者們談了交易，只要他們將鎮長家的魔法盒交給他，就能贖回被他綁走的Jonathan。
真身是來自深淵（the Deep）的一頭綁匪怪蛙，其手下為魚人，與拉索斯教簽訂了契約。
計劃在Sebano蓋一個建設，卻被冒險者們打斷了計劃，也殺光了他的手下。
在從冒險者們手上搶走魔法盒子之後就消失了，也連帶將幾名冒險者們溶成了泥。
descEn:
The leader of a local gangster in Sebano who had a very strong-build body.
His henchmen were not good fighters.
A local “tavern" was pretty much like the base of his gang.
Hobb seemed to be a believer of Laxthos, with his arms tattooed with Laxthos prayers.
It seemed like he and Drayer had known each other for some time.
Hobb negotiated a deal with the adventurers, with them handing him the magic box from Mayor Thorne’s house to release Jonathan, who was kidnapped by him.
The real identity of Hobb is a Banderhobb from the Deep, with merfolks has his henchmen, and he signed a contract with the Laxthos.
Hobb planned to build a construct in Sebano, but was interrupted by the adventurers and all his henchmen was killed.
After taking the magic box from the adventurers, Hobb disappeared after melting several adventurers into mud.

name: The Hooded Figure
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮出現的神秘存在。
只有在深夜時，會披著黑色斗篷，出現在鎮上的街道上，露出他橘紅色閃閃發光的雙眼，有人還曾聽過他發出惡魔般的狂笑聲。
他的身份至今無人知曉。
在沃瓦倫滅鎮事件後，被冒險者目擊逃入寂靜殿內，疑似躲進了神父辦公室後掩藏通往地下的密室。
在Macksohn曾被Paladin和Samael分別目擊到。
依照Franz的說明，他是拉索斯教的傳訊者，會出現在不同的城市。
descEn:
A mysterious figure seen in Vowalon.
Only at midnight, this hooded figure would be seen on the streets, with its orange eyes glowing. Some even claimed that they heard it laughed manically.
Its identity had not been revealed until now.
After the incident in Vowalon, it was seen sneaking into the Temple of Silencio, suspected to delve into the dungeon from the Father’s office.
He was seen by both Paladin and Samael at Mackoshn.
As Franz’s investigation implied, it is a courier of Laxthos, appearing in different cities.

name: Ilyra Valecrest
descZh:
拉撒拿的年輕記者，邀請冒險團隊接受他針對阿龍父母的命案，與正名為Cyrinel的阿龍登基為新任龍冠的採訪。
比起華麗的八卦新聞，更重視案件的本質。
在採訪過程中，也首次讓冒險團隊揭露他們的團名：「中途之家」。
descEn:
A young journalist in Rathanad, who interviewed the party about the death of Al-lon’s parent, and also the newly crowned Cyrinel Arylith.
Instead of juicy gossip news, Ilyra values more about the truth.
In the process of the interview, she also managed to make the party reveal their official name “the Halfway House".

name: Indigo
descZh:
Samael的阿嬤。
原本以為在十多年前已經病死，卻離奇地出現在Feywild。
懂一般語、妖精語，以及Fey，而且有穿越一般世界與Feywild的能力。
在Feywild作為冒險者們的嚮導之一。
喜歡挖苦Samael，但其實對Samael也很照顧與看好。
身邊時常跟著不同的男伴。
descEn:
The grandmother of Samael.
She was considered dead from illness more than 10 years ago, but appeared in the Feywild instead.
Knowing common, Elvish, and Fey, Indigo also had the ability to travel between the material world and Feywild.
Act as a guide to the adventurers in the Feywild.
Liked to talk to Samael sarcastically, but actually looked after Samael and had high expectation to Samael.
Indigo often had different male partners along her side.

name: Iochi Mari
descZh:
一名有著銀白毛色的狐狸人修女，目前在方努爾市的聖津菈大教堂服務。
小時候和Midori、Yuki一起在Nimu孤兒院長大。
descEn:
A fox-folk nun with silver-white fur, currently serving at St. Keinra Cathedral in Fanaur City.
She grew up in the Nimu Orphanage together with Midori and Yuki.

name: Lord Ishton
descZh:
國王Elliot四世的前大學士，他的家族似乎一直都是歷代國王的大學士。
有一隻貓頭鷹Oliver the Wise給予他魔法能量。
在離開辦公室去找被關押在王宮監獄的蜘蛛王手下時，與Oliver斷了聯繫，因此被Oliver認定遭到不測。
descEn:
The former grand secretariat of King Elliot IV.
His family seemed to be serving as the same spot for generations of kings.
Lord Ishton had an owl, Oliver the Wise, giving him magical powers.
After leaving his office to find the spy from the Spider God who was locked in the Palace PRison, Lord Ishton and Oliver’s connection was broken, and with that, Oliver inferred Lord Ishton was killed.

name: Jacob
descZh:
在《The False Hydra of Moorland Haunt》中Moorland Haunt當地酒館Silence的店小二。
然而在冒險者隔天起床後，卻成了Silence酒館的老闆。
15051年時，與Eva結婚。
descEn:
The waiter working in the local tavern Silence in Moorland Haunt in “the False Hydra of Moorland Haunt".
As the adventurer woke up the next morning, he was turned into the owner of Silence.
Jacob married Eva in 15051D.E.

name: Jasmine Warren
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮長Daryl的妻子。
聘請冒險者至Wescoe帶回Grenland大法師，以進行儀式來解除沃瓦倫的詛咒，卻在冒險者們回到Vowalon前失蹤了。
冒險者們在地下城發現Jasmine被獻祭的屍體，冰冷而毫無血色，胸口插的匕首上面寫著拉索斯語的sacrifice與bloodline。而他的全名也被昭告為Jasmine Dranison Warren。
descEn:
Wife of Daryl, the mayor of Vowalon.
Hired the adventurers to bring the archmage Grenland Folsen from Wescoe back to Vowalon to remove the curse of Vowalon, but gone missing before the adventurers returned.
The adventurers found Jasmine’s body sacrificed on an altar to a ritual, cold and bloodless, with a dagger stabbed into her chest with Laxthosian writings of sacrifice and bloodline. Her full name, Jasmine Dranison Warren was written on the altar.

name: Jeff
descZh:
Paladin家的老僕人。
自Paladin幼時就在家裡服務。
十分關心Magnus爵士的身體狀況。
descEn:
The old servant in Paladin’s house.
He had been working in Paladin’s house since Paladin was a kid.
Cared a lot about Syr Magnus’s health.

name: Jefferey Berners
descZh:
Macksohn貴族家族The Berners Family現任的代表人。
老婆為Ona，孫子為Lance。
descEn:
The current face of the Macksohn noble family, the Berners Family.
His wife is Ona, and his grandson is Lance.

name: Jonathan
descZh:
Macksohn當地酒館Sunrise的老闆與主廚。
因為小時候曾被龍人欺凌，而在酒館鬥毆事件中對Ron出手。鬥毆後為表歉意，聘用Ron在Sunrise作為廚師，並讓Ron住在Sunrise後台的員工休息室。
然而因Ron住宿的第一晚就遇到Lemmy造成的突發事件，讓Jonathan決定出錢給Ron在外面找地方住。
隔天Jonathan卻失蹤了。
隨著Frankie給予的線索，Paladin與他的新夥伴們在Sebano發現了化名為Jonas的Jonathan，但他似乎被捲入了什麼事件，被Hobb五花大綁。
最後，在Paladin面前被Anna殺死。
descEn:
The owner and chef of Sunrise, a local tavern in Macksohn.
Jonathan was bullied by dragonborns when he was a kid, so he attacked Ron in the tavern fight. To apologize, he hired Ron as the chef in Sunrise, and permit him to live in the employee’s room.
However, the first night Ron lived in Sunrise, there were incident caused by Lemmy, which led to Jonathan changed his mind and instead gave money for Ron to find somewhere else to live outside the tavern.
The next day, Jonathan was nowhere to be found.
Following Frankie’s lead, Paladin and his new group of adventurers found Jonathan at Sebano, with the alias Jonas. But he was in the midst of some trouble, as he got tied up by Hobb.
In the end, Jonathan was brutally murdered by Anna in front of Paladin.

name: Joseph from Moorland Haunt
descZh:
在《The False Hydra of Moorland Haunt》中Moorland Haunt當地酒館Silence的老闆。
然而在冒險者隔天起床後卻消失了蹤影甚至被遺忘，且酒館老闆換成了別的人。
descEn:
The owner of Silence, a local tavern in Moorland Haunt, from “the False Hydra of Moorland Haunt".
However, he was missing and even forgotten the day after, and the owner of the tavern was replaced.

name: Joseph from St. Rayami Island
descZh:
居住在金海岸礦坑附近的遊民。
似乎因為投資股票失利而破產。
在金海岸礦坑的戰鬥中不幸喪生。
descEn:
A homeless man living near the Gold Coast Mines.
He seems to have gone bankrupt due to failed stock investments.
He was unfortunately killed during the battle at the Gold Coast Mines.

name: Kai
descZh:
寂靜殿收養的孤兒。
有顆冒險的心，但是因為很敬重Father Kaulton，而乖乖待在殿內，不曾離開過沃瓦倫鎮。
descEn:
An orphan adopted by Temple of Silencio.
Kai wanted to go on an adventurer, but due to his respect towards Father Kaulton, he stayed in the temple, and never left Vowalon.

name: Father Karu
descZh: 服從神社的神父，看起來出身貴族。
descEn: The Father of Shrine of Obedience, looks like he was from a noble family.

name: Father Kaulton
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮的神父，負責管理寂靜殿，並帶領鎮上民眾禱告。
於一年前來到沃瓦倫鎮擔任神父。
主持解除詛咒的祈禱儀式，卻也造成了沃瓦倫滅鎮事件，而後被台北市議員殺死。
descEn:
The Father in Vowalon, in charge of the Temple of Silencio, and leading the prayers for the town folks.
Came to Vowalon a year ago.
Hosted the ritual to remove the cursed, but was also responsible for the slaughter of Vowalon, and later killed by the Councilor of Taipei.

name: Kahn
descZh:
麥克嵩的衛兵。
奉命在小木屋內看守Paladin，卻被Paladin的馬伕Cena襲擊而被反綁在椅子上並換成馬伕裝。
被Midori和YHWH拯救，卻在帶兩人到Sunrise後被Lemmy劃破喉嚨而死。
手上刺有十道光芒的太陽。
descEn:
A guard in Macksohn.
Ordered to watch for Paladin in the cabin, but attacked by Cena and was disguised as Cena, tied on a chair.
Rescued by Midori and YHWH, but was cut by the throat by Lemmy after he brought the two to Sunrise.
He has a tattoo of a sun with ten rays on his arm.

name: Kess
descZh:
Macksohn旅店White Brick服務生之一。
是Clark帶領的新人。
與Midori表示自己曾去過傳說中麥克嵩能交換情報的地方，願意帶他過去。
似乎對於Samael十分著迷。
descEn:
A front desk in White Brick, Macksohn.
The rookie that Clark is responsible of.
Shared to Midori about a place to trade information, and was willing to take her there.
Seemed to be obsessed with Samael.

name: Kevin Bolden
descZh:
Macksohn當地旅店The Gates Inn的老闆。是貴族家庭的後代，但為了證明自己可以自力更生，開了The Gates Inn。
個性十分單純，容易相信人。
對Midori有所迷戀。為了向Midori賠罪，送了他一條家中的珍珠項鍊。
descEn:
The owner of the Gates Inn, a local tavern in Macksohn. Kevin was from a noble family, but to prove his ability to be self-reliance, he opened the Gates Inn.
Kevin was a naive man who believed in others easily.
He had a crush on Midori. To apologize to her, Kevin gave her a pearl necklace from his family.

name: King Knicol
descZh:
地底王尼可大人。
冒險者於地下城與哥布林激戰後俘虜的一隻哥布林。在哥布林王戰死後，被冒險者加冕為地底王，並賜名尼可。
被Usioni五花大綁，大多數時間掛在他的背後，作為防身的工具。
本名呱啦。
descEn:
Lord Knicol, King of the Underground, aka King Kincol.
The goblin that the adventurers captured after the fight in the dungeon. After the Goblin King was dead, he was crown the King of the Underground and Knicol was given as his name by the adventurers.
King Knicol was mostly tied behind Usioni and was acted as his shield.
His birth name was Guala.

name: Kojo
descZh:
在《The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman》中，住在El'Nore的中年男性人類。經營著一間小店，裡面有不少材料與雜貨。
向冒險者們揭露El'Nore當地妖精的陰謀。
在儀式當晚，協助Anedak拯救遭到綁架的其他冒險者們。
似乎有強大的魔法能力。
最後在儀式現場倒地，沒能逃離。
descEn:
A middle aged human who run a small store at El'Nore from “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman".
Revealed the conspiracy of the elves to the adventurers.
Helped Anedak save the other kidnapped adventurers at the night of the ritual.
Seems to have strong magical power.
Fainted at the ritual at the end, and didn’t survive.

name: Lance Berners
descZh:
Macksohn當地貴族家庭Berners Family成員之一，祖父為Jefferey，祖母為Ona，母親為Selene，父親為Gary。
對於冒險者們與冒險故事十分有興趣。
在Lemmy等人闖入其宅邸後，將Lemmy綁住並拷問他，最後將一枚黑色寶石沒入Lemmy胸前以進行追蹤。
descEn:
A family member of the Macksohn local noble house Berners. Jefferey is his grandfather, Ona his grandmother, Selene and Gary his parents.
Had high interest in the stories of the adventurers.
After Lemmy and the others intruded the Berners house, he tied up Lemmy and tortured him, and put a black diamond into his chest to track him.

name: Laura Fishburne
descZh:
T.I.D.E.S.的成員之一。
藉由挑戰Riley Richmond成功，晉升為方尖碑的一員。
descEn:
A member of the T.I.D.E.S.
After succeeding challenging Riley Richmond, Laura became one of the Obelisk.

name: LaVinci
descZh:
由Sha’Doom假扮的人物。
自稱是麥克嵩經營各類事務的經紀人，對於吟遊詩人Franz以及荒野旋律有著很濃厚的興趣，不過似乎被Mr. Moon威脅。
descEn:
A character disguised by Sha’Doom.
Claimed to be an agent of all kinds in Macksohn, interested in Franz and Rythm of the Wild, but threatened by Mr. Moon.

name: Leonard “Old Pipe" Riversend
descZh:
阿龍的養父。
數年前，阿龍因控制不了情緒，誤傷他的養父，而逃離土城。
阿龍回來後，發現Leonard拄著拐杖，卻稱自己是因為爬山受傷才需要拐杖。
descEn:
Al-lon’s foster father.
Years ago, Al-lon accidentally hurt Leonard due to him losing control of himself, and fled Mudtown.
After Al-lon came back to Mudtown, he found Leonard with a crutch, claiming that it was due to his own accident on a trip to the mountains.

name: Leslie Grunfeld
descZh:
Sora的母親，Pete的妻子，婚後雖然冠夫姓為Leslie Madison，主要還是以自己的本名自稱。
父親為匿名之聲的領導人，但他並不相信這個宗教團體。
在Sora死後，召集匿名之聲的群眾，創立了拉索斯教，被尊稱為拉索斯夫人。
descEn:
The mother of Sora and the wife of Pete. Even though changed her last name to Madison after marriage, she mostly used her original family name.
Her father was the leader of Voice of the Anonymous, but she never believed in the religious group.
After the death of Sora, she gathered the members of Voice of the Anonymous and found the religion Laxthos, and was remembered as the Lady of Laxthos.

name: Lewis
descZh:
Edmond’s Diner (Macksohn)的店長。
與Dr. David熟識，考慮聘用Ron為廚師。
descEn:
The manager of Edmond’s Diner Macksohn branch.
Familiar with Dr. David.
Considered hiring Ron as a chef.

name: Lil’Lily
descZh:
本名Lilith，是歐德里克聘來當地城的嚮導。
雖然工作時臉色不好看，但還是十分盡責，備受歐德里克信任。
descEn:
Her real name is Lilith, and she was hired by Odrick to serve as a guide in the dungeon.
Although she often looks displeased while working, she is very dedicated and greatly trusted by Odrick.

name: Liliana
descZh:
有著一頭銀白色短髮的津菈教聖騎士，和半妖精Ralf是冒險夥伴。
兩人受瑪琳船長之邀來到聖Rayami島協助調查島上的失蹤以及中毒事件。
descEn:
A Paladin of Keinra with short silver-white hair, and the adventuring partner of the half-elf Ralf.
The two were invited by Captain Marin to come to St. Rayami Island to help investigate the disappearances and poisoning incidents occurring there.

name: Logan
descZh:
被關在麥克嵩王宮監獄的犯人之一，十分纖瘦，性格有點神經質的男子。
臉上有著類似傷痕般的大量刺青，顏色非常多樣。
可以從自己的手臂劃出鮮血，並將鮮血化為武器。
沒有逃獄成功。
descEn:
A prisoner locked up in the Macksohn Palace Jail. Logan was very skinny, and was a sensitive, paranoid man.
Logan had a lot of scars-like tattoo on his face with different colors.
He can bleed out from his arms and turn blood into weapons.
Didn’t succeed the jail break.

name: Lorin Reese
descZh:
征服者洛林。
洛森王朝首任皇帝。
descEn:
Lorin the Conqueror.
The first emperor of the Lothum Dynasty.

name: Lumio
descZh:
Fenadra的機器人衛兵，十分有群眾魅力。
與Ubbo一同爭取心空席的席次，並順利晉級到決選。
在決賽中對Ubbo造成極大量的傷害，但最後在其他冒險夥伴的聯手下被擊敗，於空中化為火球，在地面炸開。
descEn:
A charismatic warforged guard in Fenadra.
Lumio ran for the vacancy of the Seat of Heartless against Ubbo, and entered the finals.
In the final contest, Lumio dealt tons of damage to Ubbo, but was defeated by the other adventurers. He turned into a huge fireball and exloded on the ground.

name: Luny
descZh:
在《The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman》中El'Nore當地宗教，月之神信仰支派的宗教領袖，被當地居民敬稱為教主大人。
邀請冒險者們參加當地的宗教儀式。
descEn:
The religious leader of Phyneal in El'Nore, from “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman". He was called the Lord Bishop by the locals.
Luny invited the adventurers to the local ritual.

name: Lysien Amoret
descZh:
名為利希恩・阿莫雷，長期資助Lott與其冒險夥伴的匿名神秘貴族。
在一次給Lott等人的信中，邀請他們至他的「覆羽莊園」，並署名為「羽王」。
在晚宴中，提及自己曾被月神芬尼爾賜予愛人，卻也被芬尼爾將其奪走，因此再也不信仰芬尼爾。另外，從他的話語中，可得知他已經生存了數百年。
利希恩的莊園內似乎有不明的力量。
descEn:
The anonymous patron who had supported Lott and his adventuring group for a long time, whose name is Lysien Amoret.
In a letter to Lott and his adventuring group, Lysien invited them to his “Feathered Estate", with “the Lord of Feathers" as his signature.
In the feast, Lysien mentioned that he was gifted a love by Phyneal, the God of Luna, but taken away later, thus he never believed in Phyneal again. Also, from his words, it seemed that he had already live for hundreds of years.
There seemed to be some mysterious power working in Lysien’s estate.

name: Mafa
descZh:
在《The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman》中El'Nore當地的營帳主人。
對冒險者十分友善，提供不少關於Gustavo失蹤的資訊。帶領冒險者們前往祭拜Gustavo與前任村長的墳墓，也帶冒險者們前往案發的儀式現場。
租給冒險者們一座營帳供他們休息。
descEn:
A tent owner in El'Nore from “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman".
Mafa was friendly to the adventurers, providing some information about the disappearance of Gustavo. He also took the adventurers to pay respect to Gustavo and the ex leader of El'Nore, and even took them to the place where the ritual happened.
Mafa rented a tent to the adventurers.

name: Magga
descZh:
弗萊特境內的優秀嚮導，但不會說普通語。
技術高超且很有經驗，唯一的問題是十分好色。
descEn:
An excellent guide in Phreit Realm, but didn’t speak the common tongue.
Magga was very talented and experienced, the only problem was he was very lustful.

name: Syr Magnus
descZh:
Paladin的父親。
麥丁頓王國騎士團的副團長，因在王都麥克嵩遭到匪徒攻擊，未及時治療傷勢，導致傷口感染，被迫退休，回到寇林菲爾德養傷，卻因重傷，很有可能喪命。
在帕拉丁犧牲了自己的左耳，透過神秘的月神教儀式後，產出了一罐粉紅色的液體。Magnus爵士喝下後，竟然神奇的完全康復了。
向Paladin透露他的生母並不是他長期以來稱為母親的那位女人，而是他在麥克嵩遇見的另一個女子，Xandria，又被稱為麥克嵩的紫羅蘭。
descEn:
The father of Paladin.
The former vice-leader of the kings guard of Mattington. Syr Magnus was attacked by bandits in Macksohn, but wasn’t cured right after that, which led to his wound infected and forced to retire to rest back in Korringfield. However, the injury was too severe that it might cost him his life.
After Paladin sacrificed his left ear, with the help of the mysterious ritual of Phyneal, a pink potion was made for Syr Magnus to drink, which got him healed magically.
He revealed to Paladin that his mother was actually a woman called Xandria, aka the Violet of Macksohn, whom he met at Macksohn.

name: Syr Galaestrel Freyeman
descZh:
萊斯諾的大臣，中年藍龍人男性。
個性溫和且堅定，但在將軍面前毫無插嘴的餘地。
認為萊斯諾與克萊芬兩地應該分治，而非強硬地靠武力收復。
descEn:
The minister in Leisnor, a mid-aged blue dragonborn male.
Galaestrel is calm but firm, but there is no room for him to interrupt the general during conversation.
He believes that Leisnor and Clyphen should be ruled seperatedly, not with martial force.

name: Malcolm Hicks
descZh: 麥克嵩的貴族，家族從事奴隸生意。
descEn: A noble in Macksohn, whose family does slave business.

name: Mango
descZh:
由妖精王國的能量產出的蛋，孵出的魔法生物。
其外型由照養他的Lott的意識所塑型。
擁有超出想象的知識，但有時候會突然說出讓人恐懼又無法理解的話語。
與Lott一起在母親大人的屠殺中生存。
與Lott一起來到Fenadra後消失了一段時間，最終在Ubbo成為心空席後，以巨蛇的型態現身，且有著痛苦人臉的花紋與殘肢長在身上。
芒果將Psyber咬傷，將他拖入傳送門消失了。
descEn:
A magical creature hatched from an egg made by the energy in Lothum Kingdom.
Its appearance is decided by Lott, its caretaker.
Mango has crazy amount of knowledge, but sometimes says things that creeps out people.
Survived with Lott after the Mother’s Massacre.
After arriving Fendra with Lott, Mango disappeared for a while. It showed up after Ubbo ascended into the Seats of Eclipsed as a huge snake with tormented faces as its pattern, and appendages on its body.
Mango bit Psyber, and dragged him into a portal hole.

name: Marco
descZh:
在《The False Hydra of Moorland Haunt》中Moorland Haunt當地醫生Dr. Crow養的狗。
帶領冒險者們尋找腐臭味發出的源頭。
descEn:
The dog that Dr. Crow owned in Moorland Haunt from “the False Hydra of Moorland Haunt".
Guided the adventurers to find the source of the rotten smell.

name: Marcus Jens
descZh:
麥克嵩的貴族，家族從事情報搜集。
雇用了一名叫伊的貧民窟少年（伊稱呼他為M伯爵），似乎在調查和蜘蛛神教相關的事。
有一名叫Marianne的妹妹被關在王宮監獄內，冒險者受他委託，將Marianne從監獄救出來。
多年前曾購買了大量的魔法球，魔法球的功能似乎非常多元，而且不是只有他自己能使用。
Marcus是月神教的信徒。
在麥克嵩的擁王派失利後，與冒險者們一同逃往洛森王國，前往尋找母親大人的旅途。然而，在一次與月光狩獵會的戰鬥中，被敵人的詛咒殺死。冒險者將他安葬，並立了一個木製的墓碑。
descEn:
A noble from Macksohn whose family did intelligence gathering.
He hired a young man from the ghetto named Yi to do some investigation about the Spider God religion.
He had a sister named Marianne who was locked up in the Macksohn Palace Jail. The adventurers was paid by him to get her out of the jail.
Marcus bought a lot of magical orbs years ago, which seemed to have multiple functions, and could even be used by people other than him.
Marcus is a believer of Phyneal.
After the royalist faction failed in Macksohn, Marcus traveled with the party to Lothum, on a trip to find the Mother. However, he was cursed to death in a battle against the Moonlight Predators. The party buried him, erected a wooden tombstone for him, and paid their respect.

name: Lady Marian
descZh:
麥丁頓現任國王Elliot四世的母親，在前國王時期似乎沒有人知道他的存在。
被Oliver the Wise暗示不是人類。
似乎有一定程度的魔法能力，能主動進行心靈溝通。
根據Marianne的說法，本名為Marilyn，過去是他蜘蛛神教的夥伴，但後來信奉了拉索斯教，改名為Marian，並揭發他臥底的身份，使他被關入地牢，因此Marianne對他恨之入骨。
descEn:
The mother of the current King of Mattington, Elliot IV. She was not known when the former king reigned.
She was hinted not a human by Oliver the Wise.
Seemed to have some kind of magical powers, and could do active telepathy.
As Marianne said, Marian’s name was originally Marilyn, and was her companion of followers of the Spider God, but turned to believe in Laxthos and changed her name to Marian, also turning her in. Marianne was then locked up in jail, thus she hated Marianne deeply.

name: Marianne Jens
descZh:
麥克嵩貴族Marcus Jens的妹妹。
年輕時曾經離家出走過一段時間。
被關在麥克嵩王宮監獄，是蜘蛛神教在麥克嵩的間諜。
過去曾和當時名為Marilyn的Marian為同夥，但因為被背判而被送入地牢。
Anna過去是他的下屬。
descEn:
The sister of the Macksohn noble Marcus Jens.
She ran out of home was she was young for some time.
She was locked in the Macksohn Palace Jail for some time, as she was the spy of the Spider God.
She was a companion of Marilyn, but was send to jail by Marilyn betraying her.
Anna was her subordinate.

name: Maribel Muddlewick
descZh:
本年度競爭土城「春天精靈」的女孩之一，但輸給了Penny Applewood。他原本想透過擔任春天精靈，來和「聽說存在」的山賊進行談判，為土城謀取較為公平的利益。
父母外出旅行兩年以上都還沒回到土城來。
在與Maribel相處後，冒險者們發現他廚藝精湛、飽讀詩書，且有足夠的獨立生活能力，力邀他加入冒險團隊，但Maribel暫時沒有想離開土城的心，只想好好把書看完。
descEn:
A girl running for “the Spirit of Spring" in Mudtown this year, but lost to Penny Applewood. She wanted to become the Spirit of Spring to negotiate with the “bandits" for benefits for Mudtown.
Her parents have been traveling for over two years, and haven’t returned to Mudtown.
After spending some time with Maribel, the adventurers found her to be quite proficient with cooking, well-read, and also has the ability to live independently. They tried to convince her into joining the adventuring group, but Maribel still wants to finish her books before leaving the town.

name: Captain Marin
descZh:
方努爾市的一名船長。
受Robinson主教委託，載冒險者們到南方的荒島，尋找雪の化身の目覚め的下落。
Comissioned by Bishop Robinson to bring the adventurers to the Southern island to find the book “雪の化身の目覚め".
descEn: A captain from Fonaur.

name: Queen Marva
descZh: 克里歐門王國的前任女王，Uma女王的母親。
descEn: The former Queen of Chryomen, the mother of Queen Uma.

name: Matilda
descZh:
Wescoe的一名女子。
話不多，但與他的夥伴Maylee之間似乎頗有默契。
descEn:
A woman from Wescoe.
Didn’t talk much, but seemed to have a good understanding with her companion Maylee.

name: Maylee
descZh:
魏斯科的一名女子，年輕且十分漂亮。
在Beer, Food, Fun與Matilda和Brown說明了關於拉索斯教的事，並請Brown喝了一杯似乎被下了藥的啤酒。
descEn:
A woman from Wescoe, young and pretty.
Told Brown about Laxthos with Matilda at Beer, Food, Fun, and treated Brown a beer that was suspiciously poisoned.

name: Melvin
descZh:
大學城歷史區區長Andrea Day的助理。
自稱沒有什麼學術能力，只能幫Andrea打雜。似乎對Andrea十分懼怕。
最終在Andrea示範給冒險者們看的月神教靈魂轉移儀式中，因為是無辜的靈魂，而被犧牲。
descEn:
The assistant of Andrea Day, the leader of the History District at the Great Citadel.
Claimed that he had not much academic abilities, and could only help Andrea with chores. Seemed to be afraid of Andrea.
At the end, he was sacrificed by Andra as the innocent soul for the soul-transport ritual of Phyneal to the adventurers.

name: Michael
descZh:
Edmond’s Diner麥克嵩分店的員工，擁有粗壯且毛髮濃密的手臂。
是Ron在協助Edmond’s Diner準備Berners家族晚宴時帶領他的前輩，兩人之間似乎有著難以言喻的化學反應。
在麥克嵩比武大會遭Frankie攻擊時死於非命。
descEn:
The employee of Edmond’s Diner Macksohn Branch, had strong and hairy arms.
Led Ron as they prepared for the Berners family banquet when Ron helped Edmond’s Diner. The two had some reaction that can not be described.
He was killed by Frankie at the Macksohn Tournament.

name: Mikkel Drogskol
descZh: Drogskol家族的最後一名成員，年約二十多。在睡夢中被殺死，如今成為幽魂，徘徊在卓茲克別莊，有時會與來訪的客人攀談，但對方不一定聽得到他的聲音。
descEn: The last member of the Drogskol family, at the age of 20ish. Mikkel was killed in his bed, and became a spirit, lingering in the Drogskol Manor. He sometimes talk to visitors, but they were not guaranteed to hear his voice.

name: Moore
descZh:
卡什拉的書店店員。
店內的書似乎都是出現在卡什拉的人的人生記錄。
descEn:
A bookstore clerk at Kashla.
The books in the store seemed to all be records of people appearing in Kashla.

name: The Mother
descZh:
母親大人，麥克嵩舊城區蜘蛛神教的宗教領袖。
據說是舊城區出生，因為不知名原因頓悟，而對蜘蛛神教有所領悟的人。
出現在舊城區的一座隱密神殿（被稱為母親大人的寺廟）內，接見來訪者時，會從牆壁內的洞穴出現，現身於床上。
冒險者們也發現在貴族Bernard Norm家的三樓，有個房間，和寺廟格局相似，母親大人也會在這裡出現。
有一張佈滿皺紋的臉，表情難以解讀。會發出各種奇異的聲響來進行溝通，也會以普通語說話。
實際上，早在Alfenor誕生前就已存在於妖精王國境內，但其起源未知。
descEn:
The religious leader of the Spider God religion in old town Macksohn.
She was said to be born in the old town, but had an epiphany for some unknown reason, thus understood the religion.
She appeared in a cryptic temple, being known as Mother’s Temple. When she greeted visitors, she would appear from the hole on the wall, moving to the large ancient bed.
The adventurers also found a room similar to the temple at the third floor of the noble Bernard Norm’s house, where the Mother also appeared.
The Mother had a wrinkled face, and her facial expression was hard to interpret. She made different kinds of sounds to communicate, as she also used Common.
In fact, the Mother was born in the Elvish Kingdom even before Alfenor, but her origin was not known.

name: Mr. Moon
descZh:
Macksohn當地的音樂經紀人，有個辦公室名叫Patton’s。
給人一種精明狡黠的感覺。
在崔尼斯劇院挖掘到Samael，邀請Samael與他簽約，並給了Samael一個有🎵符號的名片。
帶冒險者們組成的樂團Rhythm of the Wild來到Berners家族的宅邸演奏。
與Berners家族似乎有長期穩地的合作。
月之神芬尼爾的信徒。
在Macksohn似乎有些許影響力，曾告訴Samael與Paladin遇到衛兵找麻煩時，可以報上他的名號。
在（部分）台北市議員離開麥克嵩前，透露自己過去和月神的交易，讓他已與死亡距離不遠。
在冒險者們回到麥克嵩時，Mr. Moon已經死去了。
descEn:
A local agent in Macksohn, who owned an office called Patton’s.
He gave people a sense of smart and cunning.
When Mr. Moon found Samael at the Trinix Theatre, he invited Samael to sign with him and gave Samael a name card with the musical note 🎵.
Mr. Moon brought Rhythm of the Wild, the band formed by the adventurers to perform at the mansion of the Berners family.
He seemed to be working with the Berners family long term.
Mr. Moon is a worshiper of Phyneal, the God of Moon.
He had some power in Macksohn, as he once told Samael and Paladin that whenever they had some problem with the guards, they can simply say his name.
As some members of the adventurers left Macksohn, he revealed the deal he had with the God of Moon, that made him close to death.
When the adventurers got back to Macksohn, Mr. Moon was already dead.

name: Mr. Muffins
descZh:
過去由Wind家飼養的巴哥犬，現在與Brown一起冒險。
似乎有能透過心靈感應的方式與人溝通，甚至可以化成似人的生物。
對Lord Wind似乎懷有很深的敵意，但對Peter則是非常保護。
descEn:
The pug that was formerly owned by the Wind family, now traveling with Brown.
Mr. Muffins seemed to have the ability to telepathy, and even morph into humanoid.
He seemed to have great hatred toward Lord Wind, but protective toward Peter.

name: Nathaniel
descZh:
崔尼斯劇院的售票人員之一，駝背的瘦弱中年男子。
十分親切，告訴了Ron關於比武大會的一些事，也推薦他觀賞Simon’s雜技團的表演。
在冒險著們從地底爬上劇院時，將舞台旁的小門鎖上，似乎奉命要讓這道門維持鎖死。
死於崔尼斯劇院大火。
descEn:
A ticket clerk at the Trinix Theatre with hunchback.
A very kind man who told Ron about the tournament, and also recommend him the go see the show of Simon’s Circus.
As the adventurers climbed from the dungeon to the theater, he locked the door next to the stage, as if he was ordered to keep the door closed.
Nathaniel died at the fire of the Trinix Theatre.

name: Nelson
descZh:
受僱於瑪琳船長的船員。
與Hayes為夫妻。
在荒島上慘死。
descEn:
A sailor hired by Captain Marin.
Nelson is the husband of Hayes.
She was killed brutally on the island.

name: Nick Pan
descZh:
由遠方來的惡魔人貴族年輕男子，戴著帽子，似乎是為了隱藏自己顯眼的短角。
十分低調。
由潘奶客座扮演。
descEn:
A young tiefling noble from faraway, who always wears a hat to hide his horns.
Nick is very low profile.
This character was portrayed by Milker Pan as an NPC.

name: Norvelle
descZh:
征服者洛林的左右手。
個性殘暴，死於其他妖精之手。
蜘蛛神教的創立者之一，屍體的粉塵被Elmond醫生撿走，拿來作為儀式的材料。
descEn:
The right hand of Lorin the conqueror.
Norvelle was cruel, and killed by other elves.
One of the founder of the Spider-God religion. The dust of his body was collected by Dr. Elmond to perform the ritual.

name: Nylessa Arylith
descZh:
阿龍的堂妹。
身材嬌小，和顏悅色，熱愛藝術。
與弟弟Vaelric感情很好，並對魔法商店老闆Harrel Mizel有很強烈的愛意。
受到Harrel的煽動，在畫室內殺害其伯伯Vaerodan與伯母Selyra，並擺放成其在夢中所見的「雙龍登仙」姿勢。
案發前請Vaelric為他竄改記憶，消除他的意圖；案發後請Vaelric為他竄改記憶，消除他行兇的記憶。
在確認其為兇手後，將受到他的父親，代理龍冠Theramond的審判。
descEn:
Al-lon’s cousin.
Has a petite build, and a pleasant face. Love arts.
Nylessa is good with her brother Vaelric, and has a strong romantic intention towards the magic item shop owner Harrel Mizel.
She was incited by Harrel, killed her uncle Vaerodan and aunt Selyra, and posture them as “the Two Dragons Ascension", which she dreamt.
Nylessa asked Vaelric to modify her memory to erase her intention, and to remove her memory of the murder after the event.
After being accused of being the murderer, Nylessa is going to be put into trial by her father, Theramond, the acting Crown.

name: Lord Octavian von Oderick
descZh:
啤酒商起家的商人，靠著低價且劣質的啤酒賺了很多錢。
近期開始涉足娛樂產業，「隨機地城」試營運中！
歐德里克啤酒，歐歐歐歐歐……五告讚！
本名為Marc Daniels。
descEn:
A merchant who began his career in the beer trade, earning a great deal of money by selling cheap, low-quality beer.
Recently, he has begun venturing into the entertainment industry, with the “Random Dungeon” currently in trial operation!
Odrick Beer—O-O-O-O-O… Awesome!
His real name is Marc Daniels.

name: Oliver
descZh: 寇林菲爾德Gay Bar的服務生，似乎對於寇林菲爾德的當地八卦有十足的了解。
descEn: The waiter at the Korringfield Gay Bar, who knew quite a lot of gossips in Korringfield.

name: Oliver the Wise
descZh:
Ishton大人所養的貓頭鷹，羽毛是潔白色的。
與Ishton大人有心靈的連結，因此感受到連結斷掉時，Ishton大人似乎是遭遇了不測。
與Tweeter等人透露了王宮內的秘辛，隨後被追上的衛兵刺死。
descEn:
The owl that was owned by Lord Ishton, whose feathers were white.
Had a connection with Lord Ishton. He sensed that Lord Ishton was dead when the connection was no more.
Revealed some secrets in the palace, and was killed by the guards not long afterwords.

name: Ona Berners
descZh:
Macksohn貴族Berners Family的成員之一，老公是Jefferey，孫子是Lance。
似乎與邁克嵩的紫羅蘭有些交情。
descEn:
A member of the Macksohn noble house Berners. Jefferey’s wife and Lance’s grandmother.
Seemed to have friendship with the Violet of Macksohn.

name: Oswald Creighton
descZh:
土城附近海雅特山上的山賊首領。
被Penny Applewood暱稱為Big Os。
為了控制手下的山賊，需每個月利用土城春天精靈身上的翠綠印記執行儀式，卻反而因為長時間相處，而讓Penny愛上他。
在Penny的口中「強壯、可靠，且善良」、「人不壞」。
descEn:
The bandit lord in Mt. Hyatt near Mudtown.
Named Big Os by Penny Applewood.
Oswald needs to use the Mark of Verdant on the Spirit of Spring to perform a ritual in order to control his bandits. However, with tons of time staying together, Penny fell in love with him.
He is, quoted by Penny, “strong, reliable and kind", and also “not a bad person".

name: Pamela Yaso
descZh:
麥克嵩的貴族，家裡似乎是經營農作物的，幾個世代前才搬遷到麥克嵩。
與華生和Sugalu在王宮花園相談甚歡，並邀請他們前來家裡作客。
在家中的晚宴，要求貴族們表態是否支持新任國王。
Pamela實際上是反對國王派，也被認為在鬥爭中策劃將支持國王派的人馬幾乎都殺光了，其中包含他的朋友Bernard.
descEn:
A noble in Macksohn, whose family does crop business, and moved to Macksohn a few generations ago.
Had a great talk with Watson and Sugalu at the Palace Garden, and invited them for dinner.
At the banquet at her place, she asked the nobles whether they support the new king or not.
Pamela was actually against the new king, and believed to be the one killing off the nobles who supported the new king, including her old time friend, Bernard.

name: Pattie Sylverome
descZh:
Sylerome家族被Phanero Wyatt抄家後唯一倖存的後代。
因家族與深淵的交易，被當作在深淵的俘虜，但也因此習得深淵魔法，且可以穿梭於物質世界和深淵。
將冒險者們復活，希望冒險者們能為他的家族復仇。
descEn:
The only surviving member of the Sylverome family after the massacre by Phanero Wyatt.
Due to the trade between the Sylverome family and the Deep, Pattie served as a hostage, but also learned Deep magic, and can travel between the Deep and the material world.
Pattie revived the adventurers, hoping they can avenge her family.

name: Penny Applewood
descZh:
本名Penelope。
Applewood家的長女，是土城最漂亮的女孩之一，也是阿龍的初戀。
已蟬聯土城連續三年的「春日精靈」。
愛上山賊首領Oswald Creighton，暱稱他為Big Os。計劃與他私奔，卻被Big Os拒絕。
descEn:
Penelope Applewood.
The eldest daughter in the Applewood family. One of the prettiest girl in Mudtown, and alos Al-lon’s first love.
Penny has been the “Spirit of Spring" in Mudtown for three consecutive years.
In love with the bandit lord Oswald Creighton, whom she called as Big Os. Plan to runaway with Big Os, but was rejected.

name: Pete Madison
descZh:
Sora的父親，Leslie的老公。
卡什拉的鎮長，但在Sora死後也抑鬱而死。
descEn:
The father of Sora, and the husband of Leslie.
The mayor of Kashla, but was depressed to death after the dead of Sora.

name: Peter
descZh:
Wind家的公子，年約7歲，個性十分單純。
有隻叫Mr. Muffins的巴哥犬。
descEn:
The boy from the Wind family, age seven, and was very naive.
He had a pug named Mr. Muffins.

name: Phola
descZh:
弗萊特境內的嚮導之一，相對年輕而較無經驗，但根據師父的說法「很有潛力」。事後冒險者們發現他是師父的孫子。
嗜酒。
descEn:
A young and rather inexperienced guide in Phreit Realm, who “had a lot of potential", said Shifu. The adventurers soon found that Phola was Shifu’s grandson.
Alcoholic.

name: Porter Lowe
descZh: 麥克嵩的貴族，家族從事毛皮生意。
descEn: A noble from Macksohn, whose family does fur trade.

name: Queenie
descZh:
在Wescoe服務中心工作的半身人女子。
對顧客非常熱情，講話有點急切。
descEn:
A halfling woman who worked in the Wescoe service center.
She was enthusiastic toward customers, and talks quickly.

name: Quinton Leonard
descZh: 麥克嵩的貴族，家族從事皮革生意。
descEn: A noble at Macksohn, whose family does leather trade.

name: Ralf
descZh:
有著一頭金色長髮的半妖精遊俠，和聖騎士Liliana是旅行的夥伴。
兩人受瑪琳船長之邀前往聖Rayami島協助調查島上的失蹤以及中毒事件。
Ralf在調查中被綁架到金海岸礦坑內，後被冒險者救出。
descEn:
A half-elf ranger with long golden hair, and the traveling companion of the paladin Liliana.
The two were invited by Captain Marin to travel to St. Rayami Island to help investigate the disappearances and poisoning incidents occurring there.
During the investigation, Ralf was kidnapped and taken into the Gold Coast Mines, where he was later rescued by the adventurers.

name: Rashim
descZh:
住在麥克嵩舊城區（貧民窟）的年輕男子。
雖然自稱不信蜘蛛神教，但是對貧民窟的蜘蛛神教宗教領袖母親大人似乎十分熟悉。
帶領華生前往母親大人的神殿。
descEn:
A young man living in old town Macksohn (ghetto).
He claimed not believing in the Spider God, but was familiar with Mother, the religious leader at the ghetto.
Led Watson to the temple of Mother.

name: Ra'Leer the Herder
descZh:
居住於嚎叫森林內的妖精德魯伊。
有一隻隨行的狼夥伴，Gary。
對嚎叫森林內的野生動物都十分親近且熟悉。
她近期感覺到了森林內的不平靜，覺得事有蹊蹺。
森林之神的忠實信奉者。
descEn:
The elf druid who lived in the howling forest.
She had a wolf companion, Gary.
She was familiar with the wildlife in the howling forest.
She sensed something wrong in the forest recently.
She was loyal believer of Nessis, God of Woods.

name: Reese Tig
descZh:
居住在方努爾市的人類冒險家。
協助津菈教調查城市中發生的中毒以及失蹤事件。
在Ron昏迷時將他的巫妖手臂用神秘的鍊子鍊住以抑制巫妖的法術。
後在Nimu孤兒院前方的水井下遭遇敵人，不幸喪生。
descEn:
A human adventurer residing in the city of Fanaur.
He assisted the Church of Keinra in investigating the poisoning and disappearance cases occurring throughout the city.
When Ron fell unconscious, he restrained Ron’s lich arm with a mysterious chain to suppress the lich’s magic.
He later encountered enemies beneath the well in front of the Nimu Orphanage and was unfortunately killed.

name: Riley Richmond
descZh:
里奇蒙家族的當家掌門人，Bartosz的女兒。喬里森的信奉者。
過去為T.I.D.E.S.方尖碑的成員，但被Laura Fishburne挑戰成功，而被迫帶著冒險者們離開組織。
於土城有屬於自己的研究中心「The Raven Nexus」。
descEn:
The current frontman of the Richmond family, daughter of Bartosz. Believer of Jeorisan.
She was once an Obelisk in T.I.D.E.S., but was challenged by Laura Fishburne succesfully, and expelled with the adventurers by the society.
She has her own research center, “the Raven Nexus" in Mudtown.

name: Rina & Rita
descZh:
「師父」身邊的服侍與翻譯，雙胞胎兩人總是形影不離，不太互相說話，但似乎很有默契。
對於師父的要求十分遵守。
descEn:
The servant and translator of Shifu, the twins always seemed to be next to each other. They don’t talk much to each other, but seemed like they know what the other thinks.
The twin is quite obedient to Shifu.

name: Bishop Robinson
descZh:
津菈敎的主教。
召集勇者們前往方努爾市南方的荒島，尋找津菈敎的聖典雪の化身の目覚め。
descEn:
A bishop of Keinra.
Gathered the adventurers to a island south of Fanaur, the find the holy book of 雪の化身の目覚め.

name: Roger Caleb Johnson
descZh:
凱勒布兄弟的老闆之一，兄弟中的哥哥。看起來身材壯碩，眼神兇惡，但是只要按照店內的規矩，他不會找客人的麻煩。
拉索斯教徒。
descEn:
The elder of the Caleb brothers, and also the owner of the Caleb Brothers. Looks tough, but as long as the customer follow the rules, he wouldn’t pick on you.
He was a believer of Laxthos.

name: Roline Hughes
descZh:
Macksohn貴族Hughes家族的新任掌門人。
父親為Fred Hughes。
從小就展現出極好的社交天賦，因此父親努力培養他作為家族的接班人。
與Midori和Ron在麥克嵩王宮花園初見。
在比武大會事件後對Ron產生了極深的情愫。
在認識Ron前，似乎常常出入貴族的秘密雜交派對，但如今亟欲隱藏這段過去。
在Paladin等人於15048年再次回到麥克嵩時，用心幫助他們，甚至作為掩護讓他們逃出王宮。不久後被Anna冒用身份，襲擊Paladin。後來再次見到Paladin時，協助落魄的他買東西。
在Tweeter打開第三隻眼時，他的靈魂成了與交易之神芬諾爾交易時，被犧牲的祭品，身體化成了陶瓷。
15048年的Roline在小黑屋掛著斗篷，作為交易之神的代言人。
15050年在YHWH等人回到麥克嵩時，與YHWH在文創區巧遇，但看起來眼神空洞，似乎還沒有恢復成原本的樣貌。
Ron等人到了大學城，透過歷史區區長Andrea Day的儀式，成功釋放了Roline。
descEn:
The new face of the Macksohn noble house Hughes.
Her father was Fred Hughes.
She showed her expert in social contact in her youth, thus her father trained her to be the successor of the family.
Met Midori and Ron at the Macksohn Palace Garden.
Started having a feeling towards Ron after the Macksohn Tournament incident.
She seemed to go to the nobles secret orgies quite often, but she tried hard to reveal it after knowing Ron.
After Paladin and the party returned to Macksohn at 15048 D.E., she helped them and even covered them to escape the palace. Not long after that, her identity was used by Anna to sneak onto Paladin. After seeing Paladin again, she bought him stuffs to help him.
When Tweeter opened his third eye, her souls was used as the sacrifice to fulfill the trade with Phynoir, becoming a pottery doll.
She then acted as the hooded spokesman of Phynoir at the Dark house.
When YHWH and the party returned to Macksohn at 15050 D.E., she met YHWH at the art district, but she looked hollow. It seemed like she hadn’t returned to her true self.
Ron and the party went to the Great Citadel, and with the help of Andrea Day, Roline’s soul was released through a ritual.

name: Ronald the Magician
descZh:
被稱為魔術師，看起來會使用魔法。
在嚎叫森林出現，有種植一種藍色的小顆果實。
似乎是個喜歡追求樂趣的人。
descEn:
He was called the Magician, and seemed like he can use magic.
Appeared in the Howling Forest, planting a blue fruit.
Ronald seemed like someone who enjoy fun.

name: Ronfello
descZh:
聖Rayami島上一名脾氣古怪的老礦工。
在金海岸礦坑崩塌事件中的唯一倖存者。
從此之後便一個人居住在島上的舊燈塔附近。
descEn:
An eccentric old miner on St. Rayami Island.
He is the sole survivor of the Gold Coast Mines collapse.
Since then, he has lived alone near the old lighthouse on the island.

name: Rosa Flaerry
descZh:
Paladin的導師，前麥丁頓王國騎士團團長弗列里爵士的夫人。
在冒險者們踏離地下城，來到Korringfield時承諾要保護他們。
麥克嵩比武大會時，在混亂中受傷而下肢殘廢。
descEn:
The wife of Syr Flaerry, Paladin’s mentor and the ex leader of the King’s Guard in Mattington.
As the adventurers left the dungeon, promised to protect them in Korringfield.
Rosa was hurt and became disabled in the incident of the Macksohn Tournament.

name: Ryon
descZh: 受僱於瑪琳船長的船員。
descEn: A sailor hired by Captain Marin.

name: Sammick Warren
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮長Daryl與Jasmine之子。
大約半年前，25歲的Samick被發現死於寂靜殿前，沃瓦倫的詛咒因此被鎮民廣為討論。
descEn:
The son of the mayor of Vowalon, Daryl and Jasmine.
About half a year ago, Samick, aged 25, was found dead in front of the Temple of Silenciom and so the Curse of Vowalon was spread and discussed among town folks.

name: Sapphire Gorsen
descZh:
與女兒共同經營冠軍工廠。
主要負責鍛造武器，手藝之好，吸引不少外地人特別向他訂做武器。
descEn:
Sapphire owned the Champion’s Factory with his daughter.
He was mainly in charge of the smith, and he was professional, attracting many visitors.

name: Sarah
descZh:
在《The False Hydra of Moorland Haunt》中Moorland Haunt當地酒館Silence的老闆娘。
然而在冒險者隔天起床後卻消失了蹤影。
descEn:
The wife of the owner of Silence, a local tavern in Moorland Haunt from “the False Hydra of Moorland Haunt".
She was nowhere to be found after the adventurers woke up the next day.

name: Scar-Face
descZh:
Macksohn當地衛兵，因臉上有不少刀疤，而自稱Scar-Face。
在Ron的請求下協助調查Sunrise老闆Jonathan的失蹤案件。
對Frankie的閃爍說詞也有些起疑。
承認自己是崔尼斯教的信徒，但也向Ron表示不是所有崔尼斯教的人都是有問題的。
在麥克嵩比武大會上為了保護國王巴納沃二世，遭到Frankie擊斃。
descEn:
A guard in Macksohn. He called himself “Scar-Face" due to a lot of scars on his face.
Scar-Face helped Ron investigated into the missing incident of Jonathan, the owner of Sunrise.
He had doubts toward Frankie.
Scar-Face admitted to be a believer of Trinix, but also explained to Ron that not all Trinix believers had something wrong with them.
He was killed by Frankie protecting the late King Benevol II.

name: Sean
descZh: Ron在尖頂寺的師兄，武藝十分高強。
descEn: A senpai of Ron from the Peak Temple. He was good in martial arts.

name: Selene Berners
descZh:
Macksohn當地貴族家庭The Berners Family成員之一。
Lance的母親，丈夫為Gary。
descEn:
A member of the Macksohn noble house, the Berners family.
The mother of Lance, and her husband is Gary.

name: Selyra Arylith
descZh:
阿龍的親生母親，拉撒拿現任龍冠Vaerodan的妻子。
舉止端莊優雅。
在阿龍去見銀龍後的隔天，Selyra與老公Vaerodan被發現死於Aryliths家的畫室。
descEn:
Al-lon’s biological mother, the wife of Vaerodan, the current Crown of Rathanad.
Behave in a dignified and elegant matter.
A day after Al-lon met the silver dragon, Selyra and her husband, Vaerodan, was found dead in the studio in the Arylith house.

name: Serathe Arylith
descZh:
阿龍的堂姐。
身材魁武，表情兇狠，看起來對阿龍有些不滿的情緒。後來向阿龍表明自己並非針對他，只是表達方式很直接而已。
擔任拉撒拿的守衛，負責每天的巡邏。
在自己房間內存放各種不同武器。
descEn:
Al-lon’s cousin.
Has a strong build, and looks fierce. Seems like she has some bad impression with Al-lon. She latered confessed to Al-lon that she was not targeting him. She only has a very direct way to communicate.
Acts as a guard in Rathanad, and is in charge of daily patrols.
She has a large collection of weapons in her room.

name: Shalan Hartlow
descZh:
大學城現任的城主，歷史區出生。
待人感覺十分隨興。
descEn:
The current leader of the Great Citadel, Shalan was from the history district.
He treat people with a casual attitude.

name: Sham
descZh:
有著Lord Ishton身體的人，自稱是月神給予他的。
離開小黑屋時，看見Tweeter的第三隻眼，表示無條件聽從他的命令。
descEn:
A man with the body of Lord Ishton, who claimed was given by the God of Moon.
After leaving the Dark house, Sham saw Tweeter’s third eye, and told Tweeter that he’d obey him no matter what.

name: Sharman
descZh:
Sebano鎮長Thorne的老友，過去月神教的高僧。
在發現了月神教的秘密後，帶走了一顆光彩奪目的傳送石進行逃亡。然而，再將傳送石交給Thorne保管不久後，變遇刺身亡。
descEn:
An old friend of mayor Thorned of Sebano, a former high priest of Phyneal.
After discovered the secret of the God of Moon, he took a teleport stone that was colorful and escaped. However, after handed the stone to Thorne, Sharman was murdered.

name: Sha'Doom
descZh:
身份未名的Macksohn人。
似乎與當地衛兵有很多關聯。
手上刺有十道光芒的太陽。
曾偽裝成Lemmy、LaVinci以及Anya LaVinci。
由玩家義揚操控。
descEn:
A Macksohn local with unknown identity.
Seemed to be connected to the local guards.
He had a Sun with 10 rays on his hand.
Sha’Doom once disguised as Lemmy, LaVinci and Anya LaVinci.
This character was played by Roger.

name: Shifu
descZh:
弗萊特境內拉黎爾的一名舊識，真名未知，被尊稱為「師父」。不會一般語，需要由身邊的Rina和Rita擔任翻譯與服侍。
似乎擁有一定程度的魔法能力，能將地圖投影至空中。
住在一個看起來蠻漂亮的帳篷內，在冒險者到訪時請他們喝下似乎可以看見一些幻象的茶。
descEn:
An old acquaintance of Ra’Leer in Phreit realm. His name was not known, but he was called “Shifu" instead. He didn’t speak the common tongue, and needed Rina and Rita, who served him, to be his translator.
It seemed that Shifu had some magical power, and he could project maps in the air.

name: Sigom III
descZh:
狂暴之儀中的評議委員長，是一名瘦小的狗頭人。
鬥名為狂暴之聲(Voice of Anger)。
武器是一把中型的釘頭槌。
descEn:
The chairman of the council in the Rite of Fury, a small and slender kobold.
His battle title is the Voice of Anger.
His weapon is a medium-sized flanged mace.

name: Sora
descZh:
謎樣的小男孩。
看起來年齡大約十歲。
疑似留下了他的日記，但日記中記載的年份似乎和現在的紀元不同。
對於他的一切，可以說完全是個謎。
descEn:
A mysterious boy.
He looked like a 10 years old kid.
He seemed to left his diary, but the years in the diary was far from the current empire years.
Everything about Sora was a mystery.

name: Speedy
descZh:
台北市議員等人在麥克嵩的Kerry’s買的馬。
十分年輕健壯。
descEn:
A horse the party bought at Kerry’s, Macksohn.
Young and strong.

name: Stefano
descZh:
Macksohn旅店White Brick大廳酒吧的調酒師。
自我介紹時，表示叫他Steph也可以。
十分好客，私釀的酒有水果的香味，似乎還有些提神。
在與台北市議員認識的當晚，就送了Samael一罐自己的私釀。
descEn:
The bartender at the bar in White Brick.
He told the party to call him Steph if they like when introducing himself.
Very friendly to customers.
His home brew had the taste of fruits, and refreshing.
He gave Samael a bottle of his home brew the night they met.

name: Tam Quorr
descZh:
在心空域的宿舍與Lott搭訕的人。年約三十的人類女子。
對冒險者們表示自己在地面上是研究Phyneal的學者，多年前來到Fenadra後逐漸變異，現在覺得自己回不去了。
向冒險者們說明了很多Fenadra的規則，包涵每日兩次的禱告、衣服深淺的意義、議員與區域的關係，甚至透露了心空席從缺的消息。
雙手已嚴重變形，表情控制也十分不自然。
descEn:
A human woman in her thirties who talked to Lott in the dorm in the Realm of Hollow Heart.
Tam told the adventurers that she used to be a scholar whose topic was around Phyneal, God of Luna, and came to Fenadra. She “changed" a lot, and deemed that she has no way back to the surface now.
Tam told the adventurers a lot of rules here in Fenadra, including the two time prayers everyday, the meaning of the color of their clothes, the relationship between the seats of councilmen and the realms. She even told the adventurers about the news of the absent of the Seat of Hollow Heart.
Her hands are twisted, and her facial expression are extremely distorted.

name: Theramond Arylith
descZh:
阿龍的叔叔，Vaerodan的弟弟。
與Enelmor為夫妻，有三名孩子：Serathe、Nylessa和Vaelric。
在Vaerodan死後，成為代理龍冠。
預計在完成審判後，將龍冠交給正式成為Arylith一族的Cyrinel（即阿龍）。
descEn:
Al-lon’s uncle, Vaerodan’s younger brother.
Husband of Enelmor, father of three: Serathe, Nylessa, and Vaelric.
Became the acting Crown after the death of Vaerodan.
Expect to give the Crown to Cyrinel (Al-lon), who had officially became one of the Aryliths, after the trial.

name: Thomas
descZh:
波馬贊村的酒保。
提供Brown一個來自Wind家的任務。
descEn:
The bartender at Bomozan.
Provided Brown a mission from the Wind family.

name: Thompson
descZh:
於Batherdon經營許久的小型書店「第1410頁」內工作的店員。
與毛毛熟識，會提供雞腿給毛毛吃，似乎與領養他的貴族家庭也有不少交流。
自稱是T.I.D.E.S.組織的相關人員，但並非內部成員。
descEn:
A bookstore clerk of “Page 1410″ in Batherdon, which is a small bookstore.
Thompson is familiar with Dawn Light Fur, even provides him chicken drumsticks. He also seemed to have been working with the noble family that adopted Dawn Light Fur.
Thompson claimed to be a related with T.I.D.E.S., but not a member of it.

name: Mayor Thorne
descZh:
Sebano的鎮長，住在一個華麗的房子內，長期拄著一根拐杖。
因為房子被Inu放火，而對Inu十分厭惡。
招待冒險者們在他家夜宿。
家裡似乎有個神秘的魔法盒子。
死亡時，身上被發現有蜘蛛的咬痕。
descEn:
The mayor of Sebano, who lived in a classy house, and walk with a stick.
He hated Inu since Inu was responsible for his house on fire.
Invited the adventurers to live in his place.
There seemed to be a mysterious magic box in his house.
When he died, there were bitten marks of spiders all over his body.

name: Mayor Saerus Pharyon
descZh:
萊斯諾的市長，即「龍冠」，中年金龍人男性。
個性軟弱而優柔寡斷。
對於萊斯諾和克萊芬的立場模糊。
descEn:
The mayor, a.k.a. Crown, of Lesinor, a mid-aged gold dragonborn male.
Weak and indecisive.
Has an ambiguous stance in the situation between Leisnor and Clyphen.

name: Tina
descZh:
Batherdon的貴族Richmond家中負責照顧失智的Bartosz爵士的僕人，已經在爵士宅邸工作10年了。
據他所說，這份工作是由Bartosz爵士的女兒Riley付他薪水，且薪資十分不錯。
descEn:
The maid who had been taking care of the noble Syr Bartosz Richomnd in Batherdon for 10 years.
As told by Tina, she was paid well by Bartosz’s daughter, Riley.

name: Tommy Caleb Johnson
descZh: 凱勒布兄弟的老闆之一，兄弟中的弟弟。身材纖瘦，眼神些許狡詐。
descEn:
One of the owner of the Caleb brothers, also the younger of the twin.
Skinny, with some cunning in his eyes.

name: Trisha of Baylon
descZh:
冒險者們在地下城發現困在牢籠內的半妖精年輕女子。
Trisha自稱來自洛森王國的貝倫部落。他的父母是拉索斯教的忠誠信徒，卻遭到背叛，而導致Trisha被綁至地下城。同時，Trisha也因為父母的關係，對拉索斯教十分了解，進而對該宗教極度厭惡。
幼年時雙手手臂被刺上拉索斯經文的刺青。
隨身攜帶一個裝有開鎖工具的黑色小盒子，以及兩把匕首。
在與冒險者走在地下城的過程中，因為Uko將一顆神祕石放在他的掌心，而將神祕石吸收進了身體裡。
Trisha曾向Midori透露自己會聽到聲音叫他做不好的事情，在石頭融入他身體後，如果他反抗，便會感到極度的頭痛。
在與台北市議員們逃出地城後，與Uko一同從Korringfield逃亡，去尋找他的父母。
descEn:
The half-elf young girl the adventurers found locked up in a cage in the dungeon.
Trisha said she was from Baylon Tribe in the Lothum Kingdom. Her parents were loyal Laxthos worshippers, but was betrayed, which led to Trisha locked up in a cage.At the same time, due to her parents, Trisha was familiar with the cult, but also hated it.
She had Laxthos scripts tattooed on her arms when she was young.
She had a black box of locket picks on her, and also two daggers.
When traveling with the adventurers, a mysterious stone found by Uko was absorbed by her body.
Trisha revealed to Midori that she heard voices telling her to do bad things, and she’d felt agony if she resisted after the mysterious stone was absorbed by her.
When the party escaped the dungeon, she and Uko left Korringfield to find her parents.

name: Twiggle
descZh:
雷雅在Batherdon設下陷阱，抓到的松鼠，名為頹哥。
目前團隊中僅有Leah可以透過動物溝通術和他對話，從對話中得知他是個滿口髒話、神經質的牆頭草。
目前頹哥與鑰一起坐在鑰的推車上，和冒險者們一起冒險。
descEn:
A squirrel caught be Leah with her traps near Batherdon.
