Leah is the only one who can communicate with Twiggle through speak with animals. She found that Twiggle is a swearing edgy bandwagon squirrel.
Twiggle has been staying with Kaname on her cart and travel with the adventurers.

name: Queen Uma
descZh: 克里歐門王國現任女王，母親為前任女王Marva女王。
descEn:
The current Queen of the Chryomen Kingdom.
Her mother was the former Queen Marva.

name: Vaelric Arylith
descZh:
阿龍的堂弟。
十分年輕，卻是Arylith家族內最聰明的存在。
與姊姊Nylessa感情很好。
擅長各種魔法，甚至會竄改記憶的魔法。
descEn:
Al-lon’s cousin.
Very young, but already the smartest one in the whole Arylith family.
Vaelric is very close to his sister Nylessa.
Expert in all kinds of magic, and can even perform magic that alter memories.

name: Vaerodan Arylith
descZh:
阿龍的親生父親，現任的拉撒拿龍冠。
當年曾下令Old Nixul將阿龍的蛋拋棄。
舉止嚴肅但不嚴厲。
在阿龍去見銀龍後的隔天，Vaerodan與老婆Selyra被發現死於Aryliths家的畫室。
descEn:
Al-lon’s biological father, the current Crown of Rathanad.
Ordered Old Nixul to abandan Al-lon’s egg years ago.
Looks serious but not strict.
A day after Al-lon met the silver dragon, Vaerodan and his wife, Selyra, was found dead in the studio in the Arylith house.

name: Ms. Valentine
descZh:
Rainbow Jungle的老鴇。
有時自己也會招待客人。
descEn:
The madam in Rainbow Jungle.
She sometimes service customers, too.

name: Dr. Vaxon
descZh:
Kashla的醫生，為匿名之聲工作。
對Sora從小照顧，但也建議Sora的父母對其進行一些儀式，最終導致Sora的死亡。
曾向Sora預言會有幾名冒險者會來把他救出來。
在冒險者們與他相見時，手部似乎有些狀況，與Ron的巫妖之手十分相似。經過Midori的感知，他似乎不是人類，而是名巫妖。
descEn:
The doctor in Kashla, who worked for the Voice of the Anonymous.
Looked after Sora since Sora was a baby, but also suggested Sora’s parents with some rituals, which led to Sora’s final death.
He once told Sora a prophecy that there would be several adventurers who will bring him out.
As the adventurers met him, there seemed to be something wrong with his arms, like Ron’s arm. After Midori’s sensing, Dr. Vaxon might not be a human, but a lich.

name: Valero Berners
descZh:
年僅10歲左右，與Sora生下兒子Tari Berners。
父母為Wyatt和Lucy。
descEn:
About age 10. She had a baby with Sora, named Tari Berners.
Valero’s parents were Wyatt and Lucy.

name: Wesley Vance
descZh: 麥克嵩的貴族，家族從事觀賞植物生意。
descEn: A noble in Macksohn, whose family does ornamental plants business.

name: Willem
descZh:
Macksohn的樂器行老闆，年紀非常大，有一頭雜亂的白髮，而且似乎有重聽。
與Mr. Moon是舊識，而且Mr. Moon似乎非常信任他店內樂器的品質。
descEn:
The owner of a music instrumental store in Macksohn. Willem is old with a messy grey hair, and he had hard time listening.
Knew Mr. Moon for a long time, and Mr. Moon trusted his instruments.

name: Lord Wind
descZh:
Wind家族中父親的角色。
似乎是拉索斯教的人員，或是從事相關的貿易工作。
descEn:
The father in the Wind family.
He seemed to be working for Laxthos, or did some business that is related to Laxthos.

name: Xandria, the Violet of Macksohn
descZh:
Paladin的生母，也是半身人。居住在麥克嵩。
大家對她的形容是「傾國傾城」。
在Berners家的晚宴上，和Paladin相認，但是似乎是靠著Flaerry爵士的交涉才願意認Paladin。
在比武大會的災難後，決定和Flaerry夫婦一同回到寇林菲爾德居住。
曾將胸前的別針和髮簪分別遞給Paladin和YHWH作為信物。
descEn:
The woman who gave birth to Paladin, who lived in Macksohn.
She was described as the prettiest of all in Macksohn.
She finally admits being Paladin’s mother in the Berners banquet, but mostly due to Syr Flaerry giving up on his title.
After the Macksohn Tournament incident, she decided to go back to Korringfield with the Flaerry couple.
She gave Paladin her pin and YHWH her hairpin as gifts.

name: Xavier
descZh:
麥克嵩當地貴族之子。
有極差的生活能力，但是顏值也相對極高。
不僅對生活中大多數事情都搞不清楚怎麼做，更不會看人臉色。
由玩家式謙扮演。
descEn:
A son of a local noble in Macksohn.
Had very bad life skills, but was gorgeous and handsome.
Xavier couldn’t even read the air other than his poor life skills.
This character was played by Dango.

name: Yashin Usta
descZh: 麥克嵩的貴族，家族從事鑽石生意。
descEn: A noble in Macksohn, whose family does jewelry business.

name: The Young Mage
descZh:
寇林菲爾德知名的魔法師，經營「魔法師的雜貨店」連鎖魔法用品店。
年約12，自稱大魔法師，桀驁不遜，不過畢沒有惡意。店內的員工都對他畢恭畢敬。
自稱魔法是出生以來就有的。
其魔法外觀為淡藍色的火焰，從手發出，可蔓延至全身。
descEn:
A well known mage in Korringfield, who was the owner of “Mage’s Groceries".
Around age 12, and called himself the Grand Mage. He was proud, but not evil. The employees in the store was very polite to him.
He claimed that he had his powers since he was born,
His magic had a faint blue fire from his hands, which spread to his body.

name: Yuki
descZh:
對Midori而言非常重要的人，多次以幻影出現在Midori的腦中，也曾在妖精荒野時被Elby以幻象呈現在大家面前。
過去似乎曾被關押在一個伸手不見五指的地方，現在的動向不明。
descEn:
A very important figure to Midori, who showed up in Midori’s head a lot of times, and also projected by Elby in the Feywild.
She was once locked up in a total dark place, and there had been no clue where she is.

name: Zach
descZh:
帶領冒險者前往礦脈的矮人，愛喝啤酒。
有一隻名為BoBo-V的機器人夥伴。
在礦脈因掉入陷阱而死亡。
descEn:
The dwarf who brought the adventurers to the mine, who lived drinking beer.
He had a robot companion called BoBo-V.
Zach fell into a trap and died in the mine.

name: Zek
descZh:
狂暴戰士幫位於Lark渡口的首領。
是一名有一頭紫髮的壯碩男子。
委託冒險者去聖Rayami島上尋找失蹤的狂暴戰士幫成員。
並舉行了狂暴之儀測試Beau以及YHWH是否有加入狂暴戰士幫的資質。
descEn:
The leader of the Raging Warriors at Lark Crossing.
He is a burly man with purple hair.
He commissioned the adventurers to search St. Rayami Island for missing members of the Raging Warriors.
He also conducted the Rite of Fury to test whether Beau and YHWH were qualified to join the Raging Warriors.

name: 慢爆
descZh:
Samael於麥克嵩地下城撿到的拉茲特獸幼獸，行動緩慢，聲音低沉。
被Samael當成酷爆的弟弟養。
食性未知。
descEn:
A Laztek pup that Samael found in the Macksohn Dungeon.
It moves slowly and has a deep, rumbling voice.
Samael keeps it as 酷爆's little brother.
Its diet is unknown.

name: 嘟嘟
descZh:
Sora家養的黃金獵犬，十分活潑，受到YHWH的喜愛。
在一次Dr. Vaxon建議的儀式中，被開腸剖肚，拿來獻祭。
descEn:
The golden retriever that Sora owned, it was lively and loved by YHWH.
In a ritual hold by Dr. Vaxon, It was killed and slit through its body as a sacrifice.

name: 酷爆
descZh:
Samael於嚎叫森林守夜時撿起的幼狼，隨著台北市議員們一起行動。
在地下城時，透過Uko告知大家他的本名為Darren，不過願意接受酷爆為他的名字。
descEn:
A wolf pup that Samael found at the Howling Forest when she took the night shift.
酷爆 adventured with the party.
In the dungeon, it told Uko that its original name was Darren, but was fine with 酷爆 being its name.

name: 雪寶
descZh:
Midori和Beau在大學城歷史區遇到的魔法生物，外貌是個雪人。
他表示自己是吉拿棒教授的助理，專門研究食物的歷史。另外他也稱區長Andrea Day為「無菜單料理」。
在Midori差點把他帶去獻祭，回心轉意，將他送離Andrea家外後，將身上的雪挖了一塊給Midori，作為謝禮（但同時也威脅他，不吃掉就會受到詛咒）。
descEn:
A magical creature that Midori and Beau met at the History District in the Great Citadel, who had the appearance of a snowman.
He claimed to be the assistant of Professor Churros, majored in the history of food. Also, he called Andrea Day “Omakase”.
Midori brought it to the ritual but regretted it. After leaving Andrea’s house, it scooped some snow to Midori, as a gift (but also threatened her to finish eating them or she’ll be cursed).

name: 臭皮
descZh:
居住在金海岸礦坑中的老鼠人。
和鼠田佩特拉、髒牙是夥伴。
冒險者目睹他在金海岸礦坑中被一隻神秘的巨大黑色爪子拖入黑暗之中。
descEn:
A ratfolk living in the Gold Coast Mines.
Partner of 鼠田佩特拉 and 髒牙.
The adventurers witnessed him being dragged into the darkness by a mysterious, gigantic black claw in the Gold Coast Mines.

name: 鼠田佩特拉
descZh:
居住在金海岸礦坑中的老鼠人。
受到拉索斯教徒的脅迫，在島上綁架居民。
在金海岸礦坑的戰鬥中展現了驚人的求生意志。
descEn:
A ratfolk living in the Gold Coast Mines.
Forced by followers of Laxthos to kidnap residents on the island.
She displayed an astonishing will to survive during the battle in the Gold Coast Mines.

name: 髒牙
descZh:
居住在金海岸礦坑中的老鼠人。
和鼠田佩特拉、臭皮是夥伴。
在金海岸礦坑的戰鬥中不幸喪生。
descEn:
A ratfolk living in the Gold Coast Mines.
Partner of 鼠田佩特拉 and 臭皮.
He was unfortunately killed during the battle in the Gold Coast Mines.

name: 伊
descZh:
麥克嵩貧民窟的年輕男子，似乎和貧民窟裡的多數人都認識。
受僱於被他稱為M伯爵的Marcus Jens之下，擔任類似情報員的角色，負責搜集和蜘蛛神教相關的情報。
有一座秘密基地，裡面有不少和宗教相關的書籍。
由玩家Nasa扮演。
descEn:
A young man from old town Macksohn, who seemed to know everyone in the old town.
He was hired by Marcus Jens, whom he called Count M, as an agent, in charge of information on the Spider-God religion.
He had a secret base with lots of books on religion.
This character was played by Nasa.

name: 勇哥
descZh:
Syr Magnus給Lemmy騎去麥克嵩的馬。
年紀較大，跑的速度比較慢，但是依舊穩健且可靠。
descEn:
The horse that Syr Magnus provided Lemmy to ride to Macksohn.
He was old and slow, but still steady and reliable.
